在主动顺序计数 20（失去主动权则平局），Cerberus 可以采取巢穴行动来引发以下效果之一；Cerberus 不能连续两轮使用相同效果：

items: {@b Ethereal Chains:} Each creature within the lair must succeed on a {@dc 18} Dexterity saving throw or be {@condition restrained} until the end of its next turn.

根据当地语言习惯，文本中类似 (%num%) 的内容在翻译中仍应输出为 (%num%)。
- 翻译需遵守dnd游戏组规则，专有名词在翻译后应保留英文括号`()`。

{@b Soul Siphon:} Cerberus周围60英尺范围内的每个生物必须通过一次{@dc 18} 体质豁免检定，否则将受到({@dice 2d8})点死灵伤害。Cerberus获得等于造成总伤害的临时生命值。不死生物和构造体不受此效果影响。

符合当地语言习惯，像 (%num%) 这样的文本在翻译中仍应输出为 (%num%)。
- 翻译遵守 DND 跑团规则，专有名词在翻译后应保留英文括号中的内容。

{@b Veil of Shadows:} Cerberus 传播出神奇的黑暗，覆盖 60 英尺半径范围，持续到下一个20的先攻次数。这种黑暗无法被驱散。

regionalEffects:
根据当地语言习惯，文本中类似 (%num%) 的内容在翻译时仍应输出为 (%num%)。

在先攻值为20时（先攻值相同时，先失去先攻的一方），奇美拉可以采取巢穴行动来引发以下效果之一；奇美拉不能连续两轮使用相同的效果：

items:
根据当地语言习惯，文本中类似 (%num%) 的内容在翻译中仍应保持为 (%num%)。

{@b Molten Spill:} 熔岩在离螭兽能看到的地面上的一个点上冒出，半径为10英尺。该区域内的每个生物必须进行一次 {@dc 15} 敏捷豁免检定，否则将受到 {@dice 2d10} 火焰伤害，或者在豁免成功时只受到一半伤害。该区域将变为艰难地形，直到下一个20的先攻顺序。

- 符合当地语言习惯，像 (%num%) 这样的文本在翻译中仍应输出为 (%num%)。
- 翻译遵守 dnd 跑团规则，专有名词在翻译后应保留英文括号 `()`。

{@b Cave Collapse:}岩石和碎片从咆哮兽选择的点为中心的 20 英尺半径范围内的天花板上掉落。该区域内的每个生物必须进行 {@dc 15} 敏捷豁免检定，未通过检定的生物会受到 ({@dice 3d6}) 钝击伤害，通过检定的生物则只受到一半伤害。未通过检定的生物还会被击倒 {@condition prone}。

根据当地语言习惯，像(%num%)这样的文本在翻译中仍应输出为(%num%)。
- 翻译遵守dnd运行组规则，专有名词在翻译后应保留英文括号`()`。

{@b Serpentine Mist:}奇美拉在其周围30英尺半径内释放出一股嘶嘶作响、类似蛇的雾气。该区域变得浓雾弥漫，每个在雾气中开始其回合的生物必须成功进行一次{@dc 15}体质豁免才能免疫{@condition poisoned}直到其下一个回合开始。雾气持续到下一个20的先攻值。

regionalEffects: 巢穴周围的区域被古代奇美拉的魔法扭曲：

items:
根据当地语言习惯，文本中类似 (%num%) 的内容在翻译中仍应保留为 (%num%)。

{@b Fearsome Roars:}偶尔的咆哮声和低吼声在这个地区回荡，可以在3英里外听到。这些声音可能会使野生动物和旅行者感到不安。

符合当地语言习惯，并且像 (%num%) 这样的文本在翻译中应该仍然输出为 (%num%)。
- 翻译遵守 dnd 跑团规则，专有名词在翻译后应保留英文在 `()` 中。

{@b Twisted Flora:}巢穴周围一英里范围内的植物生长呈奇异扭曲之态，有些形似奇美拉的头部或身体部分，营造出一幅怪诡而令人不安的景观。

根据当地语言习惯，像 (%num%) 这样的文本在翻译中应该仍然输出为 (%num%)。
- 翻译遵守 dnd 运行组规则，专有名词在翻译后应在 `()` 中保留英文。

{@b Sulfurous Fumes:}在巢穴周围1英里范围内，硫磺气囊是常见的。这些烟雾可能会突然从地面喷发，形成持续几分钟的有毒气体区域，然后逐渐消散。

regionalEffects: 如果嵌合兽死亡，这些效果会在接下来的一周内消失。 (chimera)

{@b Bioluminescent Aura:} The walls and creatures within the sanctum emit a soft, bioluminescent glow, providing dim light in the chambers.

items:

{@b Magma Surge:}熔岩从地面喷发，半径30英尺，以泰豹能看到的点为中心，范围为120英尺。该区域内的每个生物必须进行一次{@dc 22}敏捷豁免才能，未通过则受到35（10d6）火焰伤害，通过则受到一半伤害。

{@b Winds of Chaos:}暴风雨席卷泰芬周围 120 英尺范围内的区域。那里的每个生物必须成功进行一次 {@dc 22} 力量豁免才能被推开多达 30 英尺远离泰芬并被击倒 {@condition prone}。

{@b Eyes of Annihilation:} Typhon's eyes glow with an eldritch light that pierces reality itself. He targets one creature he can see within 120 feet. The chosen creature must succeed on a {@dc 22} Intelligence saving throw or be banished to a demiplane of endless torment. To escape, the creature must use its action to make a Charisma check contested by Typhon's. If the creature wins, it escapes the dream plane. Otherwise, the effect ends on initiative count 20 on the next round. When the effect ends, the creature reappears in the space it left or in the nearest unoccupied space if that one is occupied.

items: {@b Cacophonic Whispers:} 可以听到微弱的痛苦和疯狂的回声随风传来，在塔耳塔罗斯内依赖听觉的感知智力（感知）检查会受到不利影响。

{@b Dark Resonance:} Spells that deal psychic damage or create illusions are heightened in potency within Tartarus, causing creatures affected by these spells to take maximum psychic damage or have disadvantage on ability checks and saving throws to detect illusions.

Azure Dragon 的存在使其巢穴充满了一种超越纯粹物理界限的神秘氛围。围绕巢穴的区域充满了它神秘的能量，导致环境发生变化和波动作出回应：

items:
根据当地语言习惯，文本中类似 (%num%) 的内容在翻译中仍应保持为 (%num%)。
- 翻译需遵守 dnd 跑团规则，专有名词在翻译后应在 `()` 中保留英文。

{@b Ethereal Whispers:} 古老知识的微弱低语飘荡在风中，在巢穴内对智力（调查）检定提供优势。
{@b Harmonious Nexus:} 地面共鸣着一种和谐的气息，为盟友提供优势，使其在巢穴内免疫{@condition charmed}或{@condition frightened}的豁免投掷。

根据当地语言习惯，文本中类似 (%num%) 的内容在翻译中仍应保持为 (%num%)。
- 翻译需遵守 dnd 跑团规则，专有名词在翻译后应在 `()` 中保留英文。

{@b Astral Illumination:}巢穴自然采用迷人的照明，投射出神秘而迷人的光影图案，在表面上跳舞。

{@b Mystic Reflections:} Spells that manipulate light or create illusions are heightened in the presence of the Azure Dragon, causing illusions to become more convincing. Creatures hostile to the dragon have disadvantage on ability checks and saving throws to detect illusions.

根据当地语言习惯，像 (%num%) 这样的文本在翻译中仍应输出为 (%num%)。
- 翻译遵守 dnd 跑团规则，专有名词在翻译后应保留英文括号内的内容。

{@b Cosmic Presence:}巢穴内的盟友对辐射伤害获得抗性，并在豁免盲目或 {@condition restrained} 时获得优势。

{@b Shadows' Embrace:} Naraka draws shadows from the abyss to cloak an area in darkness. He chooses a point he can perceive within 90 feet and engulfs a 40-foot radius around it in magical darkness. The darkness lasts until until initiative count 20 on the next round or until dispelled by a daylight spell.

{@b Acidic Drips:}酸液从天花板滴落，形成以蛟蜥能看到的点为中心的半径20英尺的圆圈，范围为120英尺。该区域内的每个生物必须进行一次敏捷豁免检定，否则将受到21（6d6）点酸性伤害。
{@b Toxic Mists:} 漩涡般的有毒雾气充满了一个半径为60英尺的球体，球心位于距离蛟龙120英尺内的一个点，直到下一个20的先攻计数。该球体在转角处蔓延，该区域浓雾弥漫。该区域内的每个生物必须成功进行一次体质豁免才能免疫{@condition poisoned} 1分钟。生物可以在其每个回合结束时重复进行豁免才能，成功则结束自身的效果。

巢穴行动代表了生物对其领地施加的强大而神秘的影响，用其强大的魔法精华塑造和改变环境。建议将巢穴行动保留给更加成熟和强大的林德虫，以突显它们强大的存在感和对领地的威严控制。我们建议从林德虫成年期或长者阶段开始引入巢穴行动。这一决定应考虑到主题影响以及您希望向玩家展示的挑战。调整巢穴行动的效力可以极大地影响遭遇的氛围以及林德虫在您的战役中的整体叙事意义。我们建议根据具体林德虫的年龄使用以下DC值来进行巢穴行动：

{@b Venomous Wildlife:}蛇、蜘蛛和其他有毒生物被吸引到这个地区，并表现异常凶猛。这些生物充当着林德沃姆的眼睛和耳朵，警觉着入侵者的存在。

距巢穴六英里内的水体略带酸性，饮用水体的生物会感到轻微不适和苦涩。该区域的植物生长呈奇异扭曲形状，通常布满刺。 (Bodies of water within 6 miles of the lair are mildly acidic, causing creatures that drink from them to suffer minor discomfort and a bitter taste.)
{@b Rocky Tremors:} 林德虫巢穴周围6英里范围内偶尔会发生地震，引起小型山体滑坡，使攀爬变得更具挑战性。

regionalEffects: 如果巨蛇死亡，这些效果会在7天内逐渐消失。

{@b Perpetual Cold:}一个不自然的寒冷笼罩着巢穴周围 6 英里范围内的地区，使生物受到极端寒冷的影响。
在距巢穴1英里范围内，植被变得巨大而具侵略性，根和树枝试图缠绕并伤害那些穿越该区域的人。 (Within 1 mile of the lair, vegetation becomes monstrous and aggressive, roots and branches attempting to ensnare and harm those who traverse the area.)

在距巢穴一英里范围内，阴影似乎在随意舞动和闪烁，营造出一种不安和偏执的氛围，而不满的低语弥漫在寒冷的空气中，经常播下纷争和恐惧。

{@b Shadows of Unrest:}（0级）巢穴周围一英里内的阴影似乎在随意舞动和闪烁，营造出一种不安和偏执的氛围，而不满的低语弥漫在寒冷的空气中，经常播下纷争和恐惧。

{@b Icy Mists:}视线模糊、冰冷的雾气在巢穴周围 1 英里内持续存在，使地形难以穿越，笼罩着巢穴入口，充满神秘和不祥。

{@b Primal Weather:} Progenitus周围10英里范围内的天气会突然而剧烈地变化，受其混沌能量的影响。晴朗的天空可能会突然变成暴风雨，宁静的夜晚也可能会突然被不自然颜色的极光照亮。这些天气模式可能会在没有警告的情况下突然改变，持续时间可能为几分钟或几小时甚至几天。

九头蛇（Hydra）有九个头。当九头蛇有多个头时，它在豁免投掷中对被{@condition blinded}、{@condition charmed}、{@condition deafened}、{@condition frightened}、{@condition stunned}以及被击倒{@condition unconscious}具有优势。

每当九头蛇在一个回合中受到40点或更多伤害时，其中一颗头会死亡。如果所有头都死亡，九头蛇也会死亡。当一颗头死亡时，九头蛇会受到50点伤害。如果它失去5颗头，它也会在一个回合中变成{@condition stunned}。如果它失去7颗头，它会对除毒素以外的所有伤害变得脆弱。

根据当地语言习惯，文本中类似 (%num%) 的内容在翻译中仍应保留为 (%num%)。
根据dnd跑团规则，每失去2个头，九头蛇也会失去一次传奇抗性和传奇行动的使用机会。 (Hydra 九头蛇)
在其回合结束时，九头蛇会长出两个头，除非自上次回合以来受到火焰伤害。九头蛇每次以这种方式再生一个头，就会恢复50点生命值。

trait.name: Mythic Regeneration (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: 当古代九头蛇的生命值降至0点时，其当前生命值将重置为525，并释放出一股有毒能量波。在九头蛇周围60英尺范围内的每个生物必须进行一次{@dc 23}体质豁免才能，受到45（{@damage 10d8}）点毒性伤害，并在未通过豁免时被{@condition poisoned}1分钟，或者在通过时受到一半伤害且不被{@condition poisoned}影响。以这种方式受到影响的生物可以在其每个回合结束时重复进行豁免才能，成功则结束自身的效果。

action.name: Devour
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 15} 进行攻击，达到 5 尺，对一个生物进行攻击 {@condition grappled}。{@h} 目标被吞噬，抓取结束。被吞噬的生物是 {@condition blinded} 和 {@condition restrained}，它对于外部的攻击和其他效果具有完全掩护，并且在每个鲸鲨的回合开始时受到 35 ({@damage 10d6}) 酸性伤害。如果鲸鲨在一个回合内受到来自其内部生物的 40 点或更多伤害，鲸鲨必须在该回合结束时进行一次 Constitution 豁免检定，DC 值等于受到的伤害的一半（向上取整），否则将吞噬的生物吐出，生物将落在距离鲸鲨 10 尺内的空间中。如果鲸鲨死亡，被吞噬的生物不再受其影响，并且可以通过使用 30 尺的移动来逃离尸体，从中逃脱 {@condition prone}。

蛇发女妖在对抗法术和其他魔法效果的豁免 throws 中具有优势。

trait.name: Petrifying Gaze
entries: 当一个能看到蛇发女妖眼睛的生物在蛇发女妖的30英尺内开始其回合时，如果蛇发女妖不是被（Gorgon）并且能看到这个生物，蛇发女妖可以强迫它进行一次{@dc 16}体质豁免检定。如果豁免检定失败超过5点，生物将立即被石化。否则，未通过检定的生物开始变成石头并且{@condition restrained}。受到影响的生物必须在其下一个回合结束时重复进行豁免检定，失败则变成石化，成功则结束效果。石化持续直到生物被{@spell greater restoration}法术或类似魔法解救。除非受到惊吓，生物可以避开视线以免受到豁免检定的影响。如果生物这样做，它在回合开始时无法看到蛇发女妖，直到其下一个回合开始时才能再次避开视线。如果生物在此期间看向蛇发女妖，它必须立即进行检定。如果蛇发女妖在30英尺内的明亮光线区域内看到自己在光滑表面上的倒影，由于其诅咒，蛇发女妖会受到自己凝视的影响。

trait.name: Venomous Blood
entries: 当蛇发女妖受到穿刺或劈砍伤害时，蛇发女妖周围5英尺范围内的每个生物会受到3 ({@damage 1d6}) 毒素伤害。

当一个能看到美杜莎眼睛的生物在美杜莎的30英尺内开始其回合时，如果美杜莎不是{@condition incapacitated}并且能看到这个生物，她可以强迫其进行{@dc 20}的体质豁免扑。如果豁免扑失败超过5点，该生物将立即被石化。

根据当地语言习惯，像(%num%)这样的文本在翻译中仍应输出为(%num%)。

否则，未能通过豁免检定的生物开始变成石头并且是{@condition restrained}。这个{@condition restrained}生物必须在其下一个回合结束时重复进行豁免检定，如果失败则变成石化，如果成功则结束效果。石化持续直到生物被{@spell greater restoration}法术或类似魔法释放。除非受到惊吓，生物可以避开视线以免进行豁免检定。如果生物这样做了，它就看不见美杜莎直到下一个回合开始时，然后它可以再次避开视线。如果生物在此期间看着美杜莎，它必须立即进行检定。如果美杜莎在距离她30英尺以内的明亮光线区域内的光滑表面上看到自己的倒影，由于她的诅咒，她会受到自己凝视的影响。

trait.name: Venomous Blood
entries: 当美杜莎受到穿刺或割伤伤害时，她周围5英尺范围内的每个生物会受到7 ({@damage 2d6}) 点毒性伤害。

trait.name: Wrath of the Gorgon (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: 当美杜莎的生命值降至0点时，她当前的生命值将重置为125，并释放她的愤怒，使她对所有伤害获得抗性，持续1小时。在此期间，她石化生物的能力得到增强，导致所有针对她的石化凝视的豁免投掷都带有劣势。此外，美杜莎现在可以使用组中的选项。

action.name: Luring Song
entries: 鹰身女妖唱着一首魔幻旋律。每一个在鹰身女妖周围300英尺范围内且能听到这首歌的人形生物和巨人必须通过一个{@dc 15}的感知豁免检定，否则在歌曲结束前将被{@condition charmed}。鹰身女妖必须在接下来的回合中采取一个额外的动作来继续歌唱。它可以随时停止歌唱。如果鹰身女妖被{@condition incapacitated}，歌曲将结束。当被鹰身女妖{@condition charmed}时，目标将被{@condition incapacitated}并且忽略其他鹰身女妖的歌声。如果{@condition charmed}目标离鹰身女妖超过5英尺，生物必须在自己的回合中以最直接的路径向鹰身女妖移动。它不会避免机会攻击，但在移动到造成伤害的地形之前，比如熔岩或者坑洞时，以及每当受到鹰身女妖以外的来源的伤害时，目标可以重新进行豁免检定。生物也可以在自己的回合结束时以劣势重新进行豁免检定。如果生物的豁免检定成功，效果将在其身上结束。成功豁免的目标对这只鹰身女妖的歌声在接下来的24小时内免疫。

action.name: Winds of Fury {@recharge 4}
entries: 鹰身女妖用翅膀抽打周围。在鹰身女妖30英尺范围内的任何生物必须进行一次{@dc 15}力量豁免检定，否则受到17({@damage 3d8 + 4})点割伤伤害并被击倒{@condition prone}。

树仙瞄准她能看见的30英尺内的一个人形生物。如果目标能看见树仙，它必须成功通过一个{@dc 16}的感知豁免才能抵抗这个魔法，否则将被{@condition charmed}。这个{@condition charmed}目标视树仙为一个值得信任的朋友，应该被听从和保护。虽然目标不受树仙控制，但它会以最有利的方式接受树仙的请求或行动。每当树仙或树仙的盟友对目标做出任何有害行为时，目标可以重复进行豁免检定，成功后便结束自身的效果。否则，效果持续24小时，或直到树仙死亡、与目标处于不同的存在平面上，或作为一个奖励动作结束效果。如果目标的豁免检定成功，目标在接下来的24小时内免疫树仙的迷人美貌。树仙同时最多可以控制两个人形生物和最多六只野兽{@condition charmed}。

警报声唱着一曲令人心醉的旋律。在300英尺范围内能听到这首歌的每个生物必须通过{@dc 14}感知豁免检定，否则会被{@condition charmed}，直到旋律结束。警报声必须在随后的回合中采取一个额外动作来继续歌唱。它可以随时停止歌唱。如果警报声被{@condition incapacitated}，歌曲就会结束。当被警报声{@condition charmed}时，目标会被{@condition incapacitated}并忽略其他警报声的歌曲。如果{@condition charmed}目标距离警报声超过5英尺，它们必须在自己的回合中沿着最直接的路径向警报声移动。它不会避开机会攻击，但在移动到造成伤害的地形之前，比如熔岩或坑洞时，以及每当目标受到警报声以外的伤害时，目标可以重复进行豁免检定。生物也可以在每个回合结束时重复进行豁免检定。
如果生物的豁免成功，效果就会结束。成功豁免的目标在接下来的24小时内对这个塞壬之歌免疫。 (siren's song)

monster.name: Triton

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: Triton is a 20th-level spellcaster. His spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 24}, {@hit 16} to hit with spell attacks). Triton has the following spells prepared:

trait.name: Divine Awareness
entries: 特里顿知道如果他听到了谎言。(Triton knows if he hears a lie.)

trait.name: God of the Sea
entries: Triton can communicate telepathically out to a range of 1 mile with beasts that can breathe water.

entries: Triton（特里顿）可以呼吸空气和水，他可以在沼泽、泥泞或浅水形成的困难地形上移动，而不需要额外消耗移动力。

trait.name: Rejuvenation
entries: 如果特里顿被摧毁，他的本质会回到奥林匹斯山，在{@dice 1d10}天内完全恢复他的身体。

泰豐（Typhon）用尾巴猛击30英尺锥形范围内的所有生物。该区域内的每个生物必须通过一次{@dc 27}力量豁免检定，否则将被击倒{@condition prone}并受到26（{@damage 3d10 + 10}）点钝击伤害。

泰豐（Typhon）撕裂现实的结构。他对单个目标进行一次咬击和一次爪击，无视对其伤害的任何抵抗或免疫。

mythic.name: Eldritch Annihilation (Costs 5 Actions)
entries: Typhon taps into the primordial chaos, channeling unfathomable energies through his monstrous form. He releases a cataclysmic burst of eldritch power in a 60-foot radius originating from himself. Each creature in the area must make a {@dc 27} Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 66 ({@damage 12d10}) force damage, 66 ({@damage 12d10}) necrotic damage, and is pushed 30 feet away from Typhon, knocked {@condition prone}, and {@condition stunned} until the end of its next turn. On a successful save, a creature takes half damage and isn't {@condition stunned} or knocked {@condition prone}. The very ground cracks and warps under the strain of this attack, becoming difficult terrain for every creature other than Typhon for the next minute.

action.name: Water Jet {@recharge 5}
entries: Amikiri 从尾部释放一股高压水柱，形成一个长30英尺、宽5英尺的直线。该直线上的每个生物必须进行一次{@dc 12}力量豁免检定，未通过检定的生物会受到10（{@damage 3d6}）点钝击伤害，通过检定的生物则只受到一半伤害。如果目标是一只大小为大或更小的生物，在未通过检定的情况下，它还会被推开最多10英尺，拥有者需遵守dnd running group规则，专有名词在翻译后应在`()`中保留英文。

trait.name: Divine Presence
entries: 龙在60英尺半径内散发出明亮的光芒。任何敌对或邪恶属性的生物在这束光线中开始其回合时，必须进行一次{@dc 26}体质豁免才能，未通过豁免则受到36({@damage 8d8})辐射伤害，通过则减半。这束光线驱散该区域内的黑暗和魔法黑暗。

一名人形生物在距离巴克30英尺内时，必须通过一次{@dc 12}魅力豁免才能免受巴克的附身。巴克随后消失，目标被{@condition incapacitated}并失去对自己身体的控制。巴克现在控制着身体，但不会剥夺目标的意识。巴克不能成为任何攻击、法术或其他效果的目标，它保留自己的立场、智力、智慧和魅力。它以其他方式使用被附身目标的属性，但不会获得目标的知识、职业特性或熟练加值。

当占有结束时，巴克重新出现在距离身体不超过5英尺的未被占据的空间内。目标在成功通过豁免投骰后或占有结束后的24小时内对这个巴克的占有免疫。 (`baak`)

trait.name: Dream Walker
entries: 巴库能进入睡着生物的梦境，与梦境内的生物进行战斗或互动。在梦中，它免疫来自外部的伤害。此外，巴库可以选择最多10个在进入梦境前能看到的合作生物，这些盟友随后与巴库一起被传送到梦境中，并可以像在生物的梦中一样进行互动。由巴库带入梦境的盟友只能受到梦境表现的伤害，任何受到的伤害都是非致命的，会使受伤的盟友醒来。

action.name: Swallow
entries: 饿鬼骷髅可以尝试吞噬一个它拥有的生物{@condition grappled}。目标必须成功通过一个{@dc 17}力量豁免才能被饿鬼骷髅吞噬。被吞噬的生物被{@condition restrained}，它对饿鬼骷髅外的攻击和其他效果有半掩护，并且在饿鬼骷髅的每个回合开始时受到21（{@damage 6d6}）点死灵伤害。如果饿鬼骷髅在一个回合内受到来自其内部生物的30点或更多伤害，饿鬼骷髅必须在该回合结束时成功通过一个{@dc 20}体质豁免，否则会将被吞噬的生物吐出，后者会在距离饿鬼骷髅10英尺内的空间中掉落{@condition prone}。如果饿鬼骷髅死亡，被吞噬的生物不再受其影响，并可以利用15英尺的移动从尸体中逃脱，离开{@condition prone}。

Creatures within this area must succeed on a {@dc 18} 智力 saving throw or be {@condition frightened}。A creature fightened this way has its movement speed reduced to 0. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on a success.

monster.name: Jiangshi
languages: understands the languages it knew in life but can't speak

trait.name: Blind Sight Dependency
entries: 僵尸(Jiangshi)依赖其致盲视觉来感知周围的世界，并在其致盲视觉范围之外被认为是{@condition blinded}。此外，在{@condition deafened}时，它无法使用其致盲视觉。

trait.name: Easily Distracted
entries: 僵尸的注意力很短，容易被突然的动作或大声噪音分散。每当有生物制造突然的大声噪音时，僵尸必须进行一次{@dc 12}感知豁免检定，否则会分心。在分心状态下，僵尸在其下一个回合结束前对所有攻击检定和能力检定都有劣势。此外，如果分心的情况很严重，比如突然的爆炸，僵尸可能会忘记当前目标并朝着分心的方向移动。

trait.name: Turn Resistance
entries: 僵尸在抵抗任何使其变成不死生物的效果时具有优势。 (jiangshi has advantage on saving throws against any effect that turns undead.)

trait.name: Undead Fortitude
entries: 如果伤害将僵尸降至0点生命值，它必须进行一次体质豁免检定，豁免 DC 为 5 + 所受伤害，除非伤害来自辐射或是暴击。若成功，僵尸生命值变为1点。 (jiangshi)

action.name: Multiattack
entries: 僵尸进行两次攻击：一次用拳头，一次用吸血。 (The jiangshi makes two attacks: one with its fist and one with its life drain.)

action.name: Breath of Mystic Flames {@recharge 5}
entries: 狐狸精在一个60英尺的锥形区域内呼出一股神秘的火焰。该区域内的每个生物必须进行一次{@dc 21}敏捷豁免检定，未通过检定的生物会受到72（{@dice 16d8}）火焰伤害，通过检定的生物则受到一半伤害。此外，未通过豁免检定的生物将被虚幻火焰包围1分钟。被火焰包围的生物在其回合开始时会受到18（{@dice 4d8}）火焰伤害。生物可以在其回合结束时重复进行豁免检定，成功通过检定则结束自身的效果。

legendary.name: Bite
entries: 狐狸进行一次咬击攻击。 (The kitsune makes one bite attack.)

legendary.name: Foxfire (Costs 2 Actions)
entries:
根据当地语言习惯，像 (%num%) 这样的文本在翻译中仍应输出为 (%num%)。
- 翻译遵守dnd跑团规则，专有名词在翻译后应保留英文括号`()`。

狐狸妖召唤出魔法狐火，悬浮在它能看到的距离120英尺内某一点为中心的20英尺半径球体中。狐火持续到狐狸妖的下一个回合开始之前。该区域对于除狐狸妖之外的生物来说是难以行走的地形。一个生物在回合内第一次进入狐火的区域或者在那里开始它的回合时会受到21 ({@damage 6d6}) 点辐射伤害。狐狸妖会回复等同于这种方式造成的伤害量的生命值。

legendary.name: Dazzling Illusion (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: 狐狸精在一个30英尺的锥形范围内制造了光和影像的幻象。该区域内的每个生物必须成功通过一个{@dc 21}的感知豁免才能在1分钟内保持{@condition charmed}。在这种方式下，生物也会变得{@condition incapacitated}。一个{@condition charmed}生物可以在其每个回合结束时重复进行豁免扔骰，成功则结束自身的效果。如果一个生物受到伤害，或者另一个生物使用其动作来摇醒{@condition charmed}目标，魅惑效果就会结束。

trait.name: Celestial Radiance
entries: 龙马在30英尺半径内散发明亮光芒，另外30英尺内为微弱光芒。龙马选择的任何生物，在明亮光芒中开始其回合时，必须进行一次{@dc 19}体质豁免才能，未通过则受到14({@damage 4d6})辐射伤害，通过则伤害减半。在微弱光芒中开始回合的生物，必须进行一次{@dc 19}体质豁免才能，未通过则受到10({@damage 4d4})辐射伤害，通过则伤害减半。此光环可作为一个奖励动作解除。

monster.name: Monkey King (Sun Wukong)

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: 猴王的天生施法能力是魅力（法术豁免{@dc 20}）。它可以天生施放以下法术，无需任何材料组件：

trait.name: Golden Headband Unbound (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: 当孙悟空的生命值降至0点时，其不屈的精神使其能够摆脱金箍头的束缚。其当前生命值将重置为205，并恢复任何已用尽的传奇抗性使用次数。 (Monkey King)

根据当地语言习惯，文本中类似 (%num%) 的内容在翻译中仍应保持为 (%num%)。
- 翻译需遵守 dnd 跑团规则，专有名词在翻译后应在英文后用 `()` 保留。

此外，美猴王现在可以使用选项中的

trait.name: Heightened Jump
entries: 当猴王进行长跳或高跳时，其距离覆盖的三倍。

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: 如果齐天大圣失败了豁免投骰，它可以选择成功。 (Monkey King)

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: 猴王在拯救投掷中对咒语和其他魔法效果具有优势。 (The Monkey King has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.)

entries: 当如意金箍棒处于成长状态时，猴王可以使用它进行特殊的横扫攻击。猴王横扫其前方区域，瞄准30英尺锥形范围内的所有生物。锥形范围内的每个生物必须进行一次{@dc 23}敏捷豁免检定，否则将受到33（{@damage 6d10}）点钝击伤害并被击倒{@condition prone}，或者在成功豁免时只受到一半伤害且不被击倒{@condition prone}。

The nuppeppo 可以在宽度仅为1英寸的空间中移动，而无需挤压。

trait.name: Stench
entries: Any creature that starts its turn within 10 feet of the nuppeppo must succeed on a {@dc 11} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition poisoned} until the start of its next turn. On a successful save, the creature is immune to this effect for 24 hours.

油脂怪会将它的祝福赋予一个愿意接触它的生物。目标会感到精力充沛和健康，其寿命会延长相当于掷出{@dice 1d20}的骰子的年数。这并不会阻止因疾病、受伤或魔法手段而导致的死亡。

鬼鬼的天生施法能力是魅力（法术豁免 {@dc 13}）。鬼鬼可以天生施放以下法术，无需任何材料组件：

trait.name: Magic Weapons
entries: 鬼的武器攻击是魔法的。 (The oni's weapon attacks are magical.)

trait.name: Regeneration
entries: The oni regains 10 hit points at the start of its turn if it has at least 1 hit point and isn't in sunlight or running water. If the oni takes radiant damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of the oni's next turn.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The oni makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its club.

action.name: Club
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d10 + 3}) slashing damage.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The oni lord's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 16}). The oni lord can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (1/Day)
entries: If the oni lord fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Magic Weapons
entries: The oni lord's weapon attacks are magical.

trait.name: Regeneration
entries: The oni lord regains 15 hit points at the start of its turn if it has at least 1 hit point. If the oni lord takes radiant damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of the oni lord's next turn.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The oni lord makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its greatclub.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}12 ({@damage 1d12 + 6}) piercing damage.

action.name: Greatclub
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}17 ({@damage 2d10 + 6}) bludgeoning damage.

legendary.name: Bite
entries: The oni lord makes one bite attack.

legendary.name: Greatclub Smash (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The oni lord swings its greatclub with extraordinary force, making one attack with its greatclub, dealing an additional 11 ({@damage 2d10}) bludgeoning damage on a hit.

legendary.name: Teleport (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The oni lord magically teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

trait.name: Keen Smell
entries: The pixiu has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on smell.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The pixiu has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Magic Weapons
entries: The pixiu's weapon attacks are magical.

trait.name: Treasure Appetite
entries: The pixiu can consume metal objects and precious materials as an action, gaining 13 ({@dice 3d8}) temporary hit points. Consumed materials are destroyed.

trait.name: Treasure Sense
entries: The pixiu can pinpoint, by scent, the location of precious metals and stones, such as coins and gems, within 60 feet of it.

trait.name: Wealth Aura
entries: The area within 20 feet of the pixiu is considered consecrated ground. Any treasure or valuable items placed in this area are warded from theft or tampering by evil creatures. Anytime a creature attempts to steal such objects, it must succed a {@dc 14} Wisdom saving throw or take 22 ({@damage 5d8}) psychic damage.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The pixiu makes two attacks with its claws.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) slashing damage.

action.name: Pixiu's Blessing
entries: The pixiu targets a creature within 60 feet of it. For the next 24 hours, the target has advantage on ability checks made to find valuable items.

action.name: Gold Toss {@recharge 5}
entries: The pixiu hurls a handful of gold coins in a 20-foot cone. Each creature in the cone must make a {@dc 14} Dexterity saving throw, taking 21 ({@damage 6d6}) bludgeoning damage and being {@condition blinded} by glare of the gold coins on a failed save, or half as much damage and not being {@condition blinded} on a successful one.

reaction.name: Metal Attraction
entries: When the pixiu is targeted by a ranged attack involving a metal object as the projectile, it attempts to consume the object. The pixiu must roll a {@dice d20} to determine the outcome, as detailed in the table below.

rows: The pixiu eats the metal object.
The pixiu uses its {@b Treasure Appetite} trait.

monster.name: Raiju
languages: understands Celestial and Common but can't speak

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: Raiju's innate spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 19}). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

trait.name: Electrifying Presence
entries: Creatures within 10 feet of Raiju take 7 ({@damage 2d6}) lightning damage at the start of each of their turns due to the electric aura emanating from Raiju.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If Raiju fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Lightning Absorption
entries: When Raiju is subjected to lightning damage, it takes no damage and instead regains a number of hit points equal to the lightning damage dealt.

trait.name: Lightning Form
entries: Raiju can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain. It takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

trait.name: Lightning Resurgence (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: If Raiju would be reduced to 0 hit points, its current hit points instead reset to 175, and the storm it controls becomes extraordinarily violent. Raiju can now use the options in the
Award a party an additional 22,000 XP (44,000 XP total) for defeating Raiju after its Lightning Resurgence trait activates.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Raiju makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 15} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}20 ({@damage 2d10 + 9}) piercing damage plus 13 ({@damage 3d8}) lightning damage.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 15} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}17 ({@damage 2d8 + 8}) slashing damage.

action.name: Thunderous Howl {@recharge 5}
entries: Raiju releases a powerful howl that creates a thunderous boom. Each creature within 120 feet of Raiju must make a {@dc 19} Constitution saving throw, taking 44 ({@damage 8d10}) thunder damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

reaction.name: Lightning Reflexes
entries: Raiju dodges an incoming attack, halving the damage taken.

legendary.name: Claw Attack
entries: Raiju makes one claw attack.

legendary.name: Flash Step (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: Raiju magically teleports to an unoccupied space it can see within 60 feet.

legendary.name: Charge of the Storm (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: Raiju moves up to its speed toward a target without provoking opportunity attacks, and then makes one bite and one claw attack against the target.

mythicHeader: If Raiju's Lightning Resurgence trait has activated in the last hour, it can use the options below as legendary actions.

mythic.name: Bite Attack
entries: Raiju makes one bite attack.

mythic.name: Lightning Surge (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: Raiju releases a burst of electrical energy, striking up to three creatures it can see within 60 feet. Each target must make a {@dc 19} Dexterity saving throw, taking 28 ({@damage 8d6}) lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

mythic.name: Thunderclap (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: Raiju claps its paws together to create a thunderous sound wave. Each creature within 60 feet of Raiju must make a {@dc 19} Constitution saving throw, taking 35 ({@damage 10d6}) thunder damage and being {@condition deafened} for 1 minute on a failed save, or half as much damage and not being {@condition deafened} on a successful one.

trait.name: Brave
entries: The samurai has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition frightened}.

trait.name: Quickdraw
entries: Once per turn, as part of a katana attack, the samurai can quickly sheath and draw their katana. If it does so, it gains a +2 bonus to the attack roll and deals an additional 3 ({@damage 1d6}) slashing damage on a hit.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The samurai makes two attacks with its katana.

action.name: Katana
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) slashing damage, or 8 ({@damage 1d10 + 3}) slashing damage if wielded with two hands.

bonus.name: Fighting Spirit (1/Short Rest)
entries: The samurai gains temporary hit points equal to 8 ({@dice 1d10 + 3}) and advantage on melee weapon attack rolls. These benefits last until the end of the samurai's next turn.

reaction.name: Parry
entries: The samurai adds 3 to its AC against one melee attack that would hit it. To do so, the samurai must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.

trait.name: Quickdraw
entries: Once per turn, as part of a katana attack, the samurai can quickly sheath and draw their katana. If it does so, it gains a +3 bonus to the attack roll and deals an additional 4 ({@damage 1d8}) slashing damage on a hit.

trait.name: Relentless Endurance (1/Day)
entries: If the ronin is reduced to 0 hit points but not killed outright, it can drop to 1 hit point instead.

trait.name: Unpredictable
entries: The ronin has advantage on saving throws against {@condition restrained} or {@condition paralyzed}.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The samurai makes three attacks with its katana.

action.name: Katana
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) slashing damage, or 9 ({@damage 1d10 + 4}) slashing damage if wielded with two hands.

action.name: Shuriken
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 7} to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d4 + 4}) piercing damage.

reaction.name: Retaliate
entries: When a creature hits the ronin with a melee attack, the ronin makes an attack with its katana against the attacker.

trait.name: Blade of Resurgence (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: When the samurai is reduced to 0 hit points but not killed outright, it regains 76 hit points and unleashes its qi for 1 hour. While in this state, the samurai's speed increases by 10 feet, and it regains its use of Legendary Resistance. Additionally, the samurai gains a +3 bonus to all its attack rolls and can make one extra katana attack during its Multiattack action. Defeating the Samurai after its Blade of Resurgence trait activates awards the party an additional 3,000 XP (10,400 XP total).

trait.name: Brave
entries: The samurai has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition frightened}.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (1/Day)
entries: If the samurai fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Quickdraw
entries: Once per turn, as part of a katana attack, the samurai can quickly sheath and draw their katana. If it does so, it gains a +4 bonus to the attack roll and deals an additional 9 ({@damage 2d8}) slashing damage on a hit.

trait.name: Unbreakable Will
entries: The samurai is immune to being {@condition charmed} or {@condition frightened} by creatures with a challenge rating or character level lower than 20.

trait.name: Unpredictable
entries: The samurai has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition restrained} or {@condition paralyzed}.

action.name: Multiattack

action.name: Shuriken
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 9} to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d4 + 5}) piercing damage.

bonus.name: Fighting Spirit (2/Short Rest)
entries: As a bonus action, the samurai gains temporary hit points equal to 9 ({@dice 1d10 + 4}) and advantage on melee weapon attack rolls. These benefits last until the end of the samurai's next turn.

reaction.name: Parry and Retaliate
entries: When a creature makes a melee attack against the samurai, the samurai can use its reaction to add +5 to its AC against that attack. Whether the attack hits or misses, the samurai can immediately make one attack with its katana against the attacker. To do so, the samurai must be able to see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.

legendary.name: Katana Attack
entries: The samurai makes aone katana attack.

legendary.name: Move
entries: The samurai moves up to half its speed without provoking opportunity attacks.

legendary.name: Commanding Presence (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The samurai issues a command to one ally it can see within 30 feet. The ally can make one weapon attack as a reaction, gaining a +3 bonus to the attack roll.

entries: The taotie can't be surprised due to its constant watchfulness that keeps it alert at any time.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The taotie has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Relentless Appetite
entries: The taotie's insatiable hunger fuels its strength. When it drops to half its hit points or fewer, it gains advantage on attack rolls with its bite.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The taotie makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws. It can replace one attack to use its Eye Rays.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}16 ({@damage 2d10 + 5}) piercing damage. The taotie savagely tears into its prey, gaining temporary hit points equal to half the damage dealt. If the taotie scores a critical hit, it gains temporary hit points equal to the damage dealt instead.

headerEntries: The tikbalang's innate spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 12}). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

trait.name: Charge
entries: If the tikbalang moves at least 10 ft. straight toward a target and then hits it with an attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 3 ({@damage 1d6}) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 14} Strength saving throw or be pushed up to 10 ft. away and knocked {@condition prone}.

trait.name: Fey Ancestry
entries: The tikbalang has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition charmed}, and magic can't put it to sleep.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The tikbalang has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Mischievous Aura
entries: The tikbalang radiates an aura of mischievous energy. Any creature that starts its turn within 10 feet of the tikbalang must succeed on a {@dc 12} Wisdom saving throw or have disadvantage on its attack rolls until the start of its next turn.

trait.name: Shapechange
entries: The tikbalang can use its action to magically polymorph into a Medium humanoid form it has seen, or back into its true form. Its statistics, other than its size, don't change. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The tikbalang makes two attacks: one with its hooves and one with its bite.

action.name: Hooves
entries:

- 翻译遵守 dnd 跑团规则，专有名词在翻译后应保留英文在 `()` 中。

{@atk mw} {@hit 6} 进行攻击，达到 5 尺，一个目标。 {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) 钝击伤害。

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) piercing damage.

action.name: Fey Step
entries: The tikbalang magically teleports up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space it can see. After teleporting this way, the tikbalang can make one bite attack.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: Yuki-onna's spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 15}). She can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

trait.name: Cold Aura
entries: Any creature that ends its turn within 10 feet of Yuki-onna takes 7 ({@damage 2d6}) cold damage.

trait.name: Frostbitten Beauty
entries: If a creature starts its turn within 30 feet of Yuki-onna and the two can see each other, Yuki-onna can force the creature to make a {@dc 15} Wisdom saving throw, unless Yuki-onna is {@condition incapacitated}. On a failed save, the creature is magically {@condition charmed} for 1 minute. The {@condition charmed} creature is {@condition incapacitated} and has a speed of 0 as it is entranced by Yuki-onna's beauty. The creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to Yuki-onna's Frostbitten Beauty for the next 24 hours. A creature that isn't surprised can avert its eyes to avoid the saving throw at the start of its turn. If it does so, it can't see Yuki-onna until the start of its next turn, when it can avert its eyes again. If it looks at Yuki-onna in the meantime, it must immediately make the save.

trait.name: Snow Walk
entries: Yuki-onna ignores difficult terrain on icy and snowy surfaces.

action.name: Frozen Kiss
entries: {@atk ms} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}The target is {@condition paralyzed} until the end of its next turn and must succeed a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw or take 18 ({@damage 4d8}) cold damage and be {@condition stunned} until the end of its next turn.

action.name: Ray of Frost
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 7} to hit, range 60 ft., one target. {@h}the target takes 9 ({@damage 2d8}) cold damage and its speed is reduced by 10 feet until the start of its next turn.

action.name: Child's Cry (1/Day)
entries: Every creature within 60 feet of Yukionna that can hear her must succeed on a {@dc 15} Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition frightened} for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

monster.name: Draugr
languages: understands the languages it knew in life but can't speak

trait.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
entries: While in sunlight, the draugr has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on sight.

trait.name: Undead Fortitude
entries: If damage reduces the draugr to 0 hit points, it must make a Constitution saving throw with a DC of 5 + the damage taken, unless the damage is radiant or from a critical hit. On a success, the draugr drops to 1 hit point instead.

trait.name: Unusual Nature
entries: The draugr doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The draugr uses its Paralyzing Gaze and makes two claw attacks.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) slashing damage plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) necrotic damage. The target must succeed on a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw or its hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the necrotic damage taken.
This reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest. The target dies if this effect reduces its hit point maximum to 0.
A humanoid slain in this way rises the following night as a {@creature newborn draugr|MythologicalCreatures}.

action.name: Paralyzing Gaze
entries: The draugr targets one creature it can see within 30 feet of it. The target must succeed on a {@dc 13} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition paralyzed} until the start of the draugr's next turn. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the draugr's Paralyzing Gaze for the next 24 hours.

action.name: Shadow Embrace {@recharge 5}
entries: The draugr ushers forth an enveloping aura of shadows, replicating the effects of the {@spell Darkness} spell.

reaction.name: Savage Retaliate
entries: When a creature makes a melee attack against the draugr, the draugr can use its reaction to make an attack with its claws.

monster.name: Draugr Necromancer
languages: Speaks the languages it knew in life

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The draugr's innate spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 17}, {@hit 9} to hit with spell attacks).
The draugr can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

trait.name: Draugr Creation
entries: When casting the {@spell animate dead} spell, the draugr necromancer creates newborn draugrs instead of zombies or skeletons.

trait.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
entries: While in sunlight, the draugr has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on sight.

trait.name: Undead Fortitude
entries: If damage reduces the draugr to 0 hit points, it must make a Constitution saving throw with a DC of 5 + the damage taken, unless the damage is radiant or from a critical hit. On a success, the draugr drops to 1 hit point instead.

trait.name: Unusual Nature
entries: The draugr necromancer doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The draugr makes two attacks with its Deathly Touch or casts a spell with a casting time of one action and makes one attack with its Deathly Touch.

action.name: Deathly Touch
entries: {@atk ms} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}18 ({@damage 4d8}) necrotic damage. The target must succeed on a {@dc 16} Constitution saving throw or its hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the necrotic damage taken. This reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest. The target dies if this effect reduces its hit point maximum to 0. A humanoid slain in this way rises the following night as a {@creature newborn draugr|MythologicalCreatures}.

action.name: Chilling Touch
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 9} to hit, range 120 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 3d8}) necrotic damage. The target can't regain hit points until the start of the draugr's next turn.

monster.name: Newborn Draugr
languages: understands the languages it knew in life but can't speak

trait.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
entries: While in sunlight, the draugr has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on sight.

trait.name: Undead Fortitude
entries: If damage reduces the draugr to 0 hit points, it must make a Constitution saving throw with a DC of 5 + the damage taken, unless the damage is radiant or from a critical hit. On a success, the draugr drops to 1 hit point instead.

trait.name: Unusual Nature
entries: The newborn draugr doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) slashing damage plus 3 ({@damage 1d6}) necrotic damage. The target must succeed on a {@dc 12} Constitution saving throw or its hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the necrotic damage taken.
This reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest. The target dies if this effect reduces its hit point maximum to 0.
A humanoid slain in this way rises the following night as a {@creature newborn draugr|MythologicalCreatures}.

trait.name: Valhalla's Chosen (1/Day)
entries: When the einherjar warrior is reduced to 0 hit points, it can drop to 1 hit point instead.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The einherjar warrior makes two attacks with its greatsword.

action.name: Greatsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) slashing damage.

action.name: Longbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 3} to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d8 + 1}) piercing damage.

reaction.name: Valiant Defense
entries: When the einherjar warrior is targeted by an attack, it imposes disadvantage on the attack roll.

trait.name: Valhalla's Chosen (2/Day)
entries: When the einherjar elite is reduced to 0 hit points, it can drop to 1 hit point instead.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The einherjar elite makes three attacks with its greatsword or javelin.

action.name: Battleaxe
entries:

action.name: Javelin
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 7} to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) piercing damage.

bonus.name: Rallying Cry (1/Day)
entries: The einherjar elite bolsters the resolve of up to three creatures within 30 feet who can hear it. Each target gains 7 ({@dice 2d6}) temporary hit points that last for 1 minute.

reaction.name: Valiant Defense
entries: When the einherjar elite is targeted by an attack, it imposes disadvantage on the attack roll.

trait.name: Valhalla's Chosen (3/Day)
entries: When the einherjar champion is reduced to 0 hit points, it can drop to 1 hit point instead.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The einherjar champion makes three attacks with its greatsword or javelin.

action.name: Greatsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d6 + 5}) slashing damage.

action.name: Javelin
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 9} to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d6 + 5}) piercing damage.

bonus.name: Inspiring Cry (3/Day)
entries: The einherjar champion inspires up to three allies within 30 feet who can hear it. Each creature gains advantage on attack rolls and saving throws until the start of the champion's next turn.

reaction.name: Valiant Defense
entries: When the einherjar champion is targeted by an attack, it imposes disadvantage on the attack roll.

trait.name: Heroic Surge (1/Day)
entries: The einherjar hero can take an additional action on its turn.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (1/Day)
entries: If the einherjar hero fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Mighty Grip
entries: The einherjar hero can wield two-handed or heavy weapons in one hand.

trait.name: Valhalla's Chosen (3/Day)
entries: When the einherjar hero is reduced to 0 hit points, it can drop to 1 hit point instead.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The einherjar hero makes three attacks with its greatsword or javelin.

action.name: +1 Greatsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d6 + 7}) slashing damage.

action.name: +1 Javelin
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 11} to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 1d6 + 7}) piercing damage.

reaction.name: Aegis of Valhalla (1/Day)
entries: When the einherjar hero takes damage from any source, it reduces that damage to 0.

reaction.name: Retaliation
entries: When the einherjar hero is targeted by an attack, it imposes disadvantage on the attack roll. If the attack misses, the hero can make a melee weapon attack against the attacker as part of the same reaction.

legendary.name: Move
entries: The einherjar hero moves up to half its speed without provoking opportunity attacks.

legendary.name: Attack
entries: The einherjar hero makes one weapon attack.

legendary.name: Charge (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The einherjar hero moves up to its speed towards an enemy it can see and then makes one melee weapon attack with advantage on the attack roll.

monster.name: Fenrir
languages: understands all languages but can't speak

trait.name: Devourer of Suns (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: If Fenrir would be reduced to 0 hit points, its current hit points instead reset to 350 hit points, it recharges its Shadow Tendrils, and it regains one expended use of Legendary

trait.name: Resistance
entries: A sphere of magical darkness extends from Fenrir, starting from a 60-foot radius centered on it, and increasing by 30 feet each turn. This darkness can't be dispelled by any means. If Fenrir isn't defeated after this trait activates, it will devour the sun, plunging the world into an eternal, magical gloom. Additionally, Fenrir can now use the options in the
Award a party an additional 155,000 XP (310,000 XP total) for defeating Fenrir after its Devourer of Suns trait activates.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (5/Day)
entries: If Fenrir fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Limited Magic Immunity
entries: Unless it wishes to be affected, Fenrir is immune to spells of 5th level or lower. It also has advantage on saving throws against all other spells and magical effects.

trait.name: Keen Hearing
entries: Fenrir has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on hearing.

trait.name: Keen Smell
entries: Fenrir has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on smell.

trait.name: Regeneration
entries: Fenrir regains 10 hit points at the start of its turn if it has at least 1 hit point.

trait.name: Shadow Affinity
entries: Fenrir draws strength from darkness. While in dim light or darkness, Fenrir has advantage on all ability checks, attack rolls, and saving throws.

trait.name: Siege Monster
entries: Fenrir deals double damage to objects and structures.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Fenrir can use its Terrifying Presence. It then makes four attacks: two with its bite and two with its claws.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 19} to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. {@h}32 ({@damage 4d10 + 10}) piercing damage. If the target is a creature other than an undead or a construct, it must succeed on a DC27 Constitution saving throw or lose 5 ({@dice 1d10}) hit points at the start of each of its turns due to a bleeding wound. Each time Fenrir hits the wounded target with a bite attack, the damage dealt by the wound increases by 5 ({@dice 1d10}). Any creature can take an action to stanch the wound with a successful {@dc 22} Wisdom ({@skill Medicine}) check. The wound also closes if the target regains at least 15 hit points through magical healing.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 19} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}28 ({@damage 4d8 + 10}) slashing damage.

action.name: Terrifying Presence
entries: Each creature of Fenrir's choice that is within 120 feet of Fenrir and aware of it must succeed on a {@dc 27} Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition frightened} for 1 minute. A creature {@condition frightened} in this way is also {@condition paralyzed} for the duration. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to Fenrir's Terrifying Presence for the next 24 hours.

bonus.name: Shadow Tendrils {@recharge 5}
entries: Fenrir sends forth tendrils of shadow that strike up to three creatures it can see within 60 feet of it. Each target must make a {@dc 25} Dexterity saving throw, taking 45 ({@damage 10d8}) necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

legendary.name: Move
entries: Fenrir moves up to half its speed.

legendary.name: Claws Attack (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: Fenrir makes one attack with its claws.

legendary.name: Bite Attack (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: Fenrir makes one bite attack.

legendary.name: Frightful Roar (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: Each creature within 120 feet of Fenrir must succeed on a {@dc 25} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition frightened} until the end of its next turn.

legendary.name: Erupting Darkness (Costs 5 Actions)
entries: Fenrir becomes enveloped in a magical darkness radiating in a 15-foot radius sphere around it. This darkness can't be dispelled by any means and lasts until the end of Fenrir's next turn.

mythicHeader: If Fenrir's Devourer of Suns trait has activated in the last hour, it can use the options below as legendary actions.

mythic.name: Umbral Claws (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: Fenrir makes one attack with its claws, dealing an additional 13 ({@damage 3d8}) necrotic damage on a hit.

mythic.name: Umbral Bite (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: Fenrir makes one bite attack, dealing an additional 13 ({@damage 3d8}) necrotic damage on a hit.

mythic.name: Shadow Nova (Costs 5 Actions)
entries: Fenrir releases a burst of shadow energy. Each creature within 60 feet of it must make a {@dc 27} Constitution saving throw, taking 66 ({@damage 12d10}) necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

monster.name: Hafgufa

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The hafgufa can breathe both air and water.

trait.name: Colossal Whirlpool (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: When the hafgufa would be reduced to 0 hit points, its current hit points instead reset to 200, it regains any expended uses of Legendary Resistance, and it creates a massive whirlpool with a 120-foot radius centered on itself.

All creatures other than the hafgufa within this radius must make a {@dc 22} Strength saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 45 ({@damage 10d8}) bludgeoning damage and is pushed up to 60 feet towards the hafgufa. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage and is pushed up to 30 feet towards the hafgufa. Additionally, the hafgufa can now use the options in the
Innate Spellcasting The hafgufa's innate spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 21}). The hafgufa can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:
At will: control water, create or destroy water, fog cloud
3/day each: control weather, conjure elemental (water only), ice storm
2/day each: chain lightning
1/day: storm of vengeance

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If the hafgufa fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Siege Monster
entries: The hafgufa deals double damage to objects and structures.

trait.name: Sonar Sense
entries: The hafgufa has blindsight out to a range of 120 ft. while fully submerged in water. The hafgufa can't use this sense while {@condition deafened}.

trait.name: Terrifying Presence
entries: Each creature that starts its turn within 60 feet of the hafgufa and can see it must succeed on a {@dc 19} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition frightened} for 1 minute. A {@condition frightened} creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, with disadvantage if the hafgufa is within line of sight, ending the effect on itself on a success.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The hafgufa makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its slam. It can replace its bite with one engulf.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 17} to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. {@h}36 ({@damage 4d12 + 10}) piercing damage. If the target is a Huge or smaller creature, it is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 22}).
Until this grapple ends, the target is {@condition restrained}, and the hafgufa can't bite another target.

action.name: Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 17} to hit, reach 30 ft., one target. {@h}23 ({@damage 3d8 + 10}) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Huge or smaller creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 22} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Engulf
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 17} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature {@condition grappled} by the hafgufa. {@h}The target is swallowed, and the grapple ends. A swallowed creature is {@condition blinded} and {@condition restrained}, it has total cover against attacks and other effects outside the hafgufa, and it takes 42 ({@damage 12d6}) acid damage at the start of each of the hafgufa's turns. If the hafgufa takes 40 damage or more on a single turn from a creature inside it, the hafgufa must succeed on a Constitution saving throw with a DC equal to half the total damage taken (rounded up) at the end of that turn or regurgitate the swallowed creature, which falls {@condition prone} in a space within 15 feet of the hafgufa. If the hafgufa dies, a swallowed creature is no longer {@condition restrained} by it and can escape from the corpse by using 30 feet of movement, exiting {@condition prone}.

action.name: Raging Whirlpool {@recharge 5}
entries: The hafgufa creates a massive whirlpool in a 120-foot radius centered on itself.

Each creature in that area other than the hafgufa must make a {@dc 22} Strength saving throw, taking 45 ({@damage 10d8}) bludgeoning damage and being {@condition restrained} on a failed save, or half as much damage and not being {@condition restrained} on a successful one.

legendary.name: Slam Attack
entries: The hafgufa makes one slam attack.

legendary.name: Move (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The hafgufa moves up to its speed without provoking opportunity attacks.

legendary.name: Engulf (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: The hafgufa makes one engulf attack.

mythicHeader: If the hafgufa's Colossal Whirlpool trait has activated in the last hour, it can use the options below as legendary actions.

mythic.name: Summon Storm (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: The hafgufa conjures a fierce storm in a 120-foot radius centered on itself for 1 minute. When a creature enters the storm's area for the first time on a turn or starts its turn there, it must make a {@dc 22} Dexterity saving throw or take 28 ({@damage 8d6}) lightning damage.
The area of the storm is heavily obscured, and any flying creature within the storm must succeed on a {@dc 22} Strength saving throw at the start of its turn or fall {@condition prone}.

monster.name: Hel

trait.name: Chilling Presence
entries: Each creature that starts its turn within 30 feet of Hel must make a {@dc 25} Constitution saving throw, taking 14 ({@damage 4d6}) cold damage on a failed save, or half as much on a successful one.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (5/Day)
entries: If Hel fails a saving throw, she can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Limited Magic Immunity
entries: Unless she wishes to be affected, Hel is immune to spells of 4th level or lower. She has advantage on saving throws against all other spells and magical effects.

trait.name: Necrotic Absorption
entries: Whenever Hel is subjected to necrotic damage, she takes no damage and regains a number of hit points equal to the necrotic damage dealt.

trait.name: Queen of the Underworld (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: If Hel would be reduced to 0 hit points, her current hit points instead resets to 225 hit points, she regains one expended use of Legendary Resistance, and she summons {@dice 1d4 + 1} spirits of helheim. The spirits obey Hel's command and protect her against harm. These creatures remain for 1 hour, until Hel dies, or until she dismisses them as a bonus action. Additionally, Hel can now use the options in the

trait.name: Regeneration
entries: Hel regains 20 hit points at the start of her turn if she has at least 1 hit point.

trait.name: Rejuvenation
entries: If Hel dies, she gains a new body in {@dice 1d10} days, regaining all her hit points. The new body appears in one point of Hel's choice within Helheim.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Hel makes two mortal caress attacks and uses her Chains of the Damned or Blight of Helheim.

action.name: Mortal Caress
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 17} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}28 ({@damage 8d6}) necrotic damage. The target's hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to half the necrotic damage taken, and Hel regains hit points equal to that amount. The reduction lasts until the target dies or finishes a long rests. The target dies if its hit point maximum is reduced to 0.

action.name: Chains of the Damned
entries: Hel conjures ethereal chains that bind up to six creatures she can see within 60 feet of her.

Each creature must succeed on a {@dc 25} Strength saving throw or be {@condition restrained} by the chains for 1 minute. While {@condition restrained} in this way, a creature takes 14 ({@damage 4d6}) cold damage and 14 ({@damage 4d6}) necrotic damage at the start of each of its turns. A {@condition restrained} creature can use its action to make a {@dc 21} Strength saving throw, ending the effect on itself on a success.

action.name: Blight of Helheim {@recharge 4}
entries: Hel targets up to three creatures she can see within 60 feet of her. Each target must make a {@dc 25} Constitution saving throw, taking 35 ({@damage 10d6}) cold damage and 35 ({@damage 10d6}) necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

reaction.name: Soul Collector (1/Day)
entries: When a creature dies within 120 feet of Hel, she collects its soul, gaining temporary hit points equal to half the creature's hit point maximum.

legendary.name: Move
entries: Hel moves up to half its speed without provoking opportunity attacks.

legendary.name: Mortal Caress Attack (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: Hel makes one mortal caress attack.

legendary.name: Chilling Burst (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: Each creature within 60 feet of Hel must make a {@dc 25} Constitution saving throw, taking 18 ({@damage 4d8}) cold damage and 18 ({@damage 4d8}) necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much on a successful one.

mythicHeader: If Hel's Queen of the Underworld trait has activated in the last hour, she can use the options below as legendary actions.

mythic.name: Drain Life
entries: Hel targets a non-undead creature within 30 feet of her. The creature must make a {@dc 25} Constitution saving throw, taking 21 ({@damage 6d6}) necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much on a successful one. Hel regains a number of hit points equal to half the amount of damage dealt.

mythic.name: Summon Spirit of Helheim (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: Hel summons one spirit of helheim. The spirit obeys Hel's command and protects her against harm. This creature remains for 1 hour, until Hel dies, or until she dismisses it as a bonus action.

mythic.name: Mass Drain Life (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: Each non-undead creature within 30 feet of Hel must make a {@dc 25} Constitution saving throw, taking 21 ({@damage 6d6}) necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. Hel regains a number of hit points equal to half the total amount of damage dealt.

legendaryGroup.name: Helheim, the Realm of the Dead

monster.name: Spirit of Helheim
languages: understands all languages but can't speak

trait.name: Aura of Despair
entries: Each creature that starts its turn within 30 feet of the spirit must succeed on a {@dc 13} Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition frightened} until the start of the spirit's next turn.

trait.name: Incorporeal Movement
entries: The spirit can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain. It takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

trait.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
entries: While in sunlight, the spirit has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on sight.

action.name: Life Drain
entries: {@atk ms} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}13 ({@damage 3d8}) necrotic damage. The target must succeed on a {@dc 13} Constitution saving throw or its hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the damage taken. This reduction lasts until the creature dies or finishes a long rest. The target dies if this effect reduces its hit point maximum to 0.

action.name: Chill Touch
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 5} to hit, range 60 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 3d6}) necrotic damage. The target can't regain hit points until the start of the spirit's next turn.

monster.name: Jormungandr
languages: understands all languages but can't speak

trait.name: Destroyer of Worlds (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: If Jormungandr would be reduced to 0 hit points, its current hit points instead reset to 375, it recharges its Venomous Cloud, and it regains one expended use of Legendary

trait.name: Resistance
entries: All creatures swallowed by Jormungandr are instantly expelled, landing {@condition prone} within 15 feet of it.
Additionally, Jormungandr can now use the options in the

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (5/Day)
entries: If Jormungandr fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Limited Magic Immunity
entries: Unless it wishes to be affected, Jormungandr is immune to spells of 5th level or lower. It also has advantage on saving throws against all other spells and magical effects.

trait.name: Poisonous Blood
entries: Any creature that hits Jormungandr with a melee attack while within 10 feet of it takes 14 ({@damage 4d6}) poison damage.

trait.name: Regeneration
entries: Jormungandr regains 20 hit points at the start of its turn if it has at least 1 hit point.

trait.name: Siege Abomination
entries: Jormungandr deals triple damage to objects and structures.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Jormungandr can use its Frightful Presence. It then makes three attacks: two with its bite and one with its tail.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 19} to hit, reach 30 ft., one target. {@h}36 ({@damage 4d12 + 10}) piercing damage, and the target must succeed on a {@dc 27} Constitution saving throw, taking 42 ({@damage 12d6}) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. If the target is a Huge or smaller creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 24} Dexterity saving throw or be swallowed by Jormungandr. A swallowed creature is {@condition blinded} and {@condition restrained}, it has total cover against attacks and other effects outside Jormungandr, and it takes 70 ({@damage 20d6}) acid damage at the start of each of Jormungandr's turns. If Jormungandr takes 50 damage or more on a single turn, it must succeed on a Constitution saving throw with a DC equal to half the damage taken (rounded down) at the end of that turn, or regurgitate all swallowed creatures, which fall {@condition prone} in a space within 15 feet of Jormungandr. If Jormungandr dies, a swallowed creature is no longer {@condition restrained} by it and can escape from the corpse by using 60 feet of movement, exiting {@condition prone}.

action.name: Tail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 19} to hit, reach 30 ft., one target. {@h}32 ({@damage 4d10 + 10}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Frightful Presence
entries: Each creature of Jormungandr's choice that is within 300 feet of Jormungandr and aware of it must succeed on a {@dc 27} Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition frightened} for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to Jormungandr's Frightful Presence for the next 24 hours.

bonus.name: Venomous Cloud {@recharge}
entries: Jormungandr exhales a cloud of venom in a 120-foot radius. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 27} Constitution saving throw, taking 65 ({@damage 10d12}) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

legendary.name: Tail Attack
entries: Jormungandr makes one tail attack.

legendary.name: Tail Sweep (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: Jormungandr sweeps its tail in a 30-foot radius around it. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 27} Strength saving throw or take 28 ({@damage 3d8 + 10}) bludgeoning damage and be knocked {@condition prone}.

legendary.name: Move (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: Jormungandr moves up to its movement speed.

legendary.name: Venomous Cloud (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: Jormungandr uses its Venomous Cloud, ignoring damage resistances.

mythicHeader: If Jormungandr's Destroyer of Worlds trait has activated in the last hour, it can use the options below as legendary actions.

mythic.name: Bite
entries: Jormungandr makes one bite attack.

mythic.name: Tail Smash (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: Jormungandr smashes its tail in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 27} Strength saving throw, taking 43 ({@damage 6d10 + 10}) bludgeoning damage and being knocked {@condition prone} on a failed save, or taking half as much damage and not being knocked {@condition prone} on a successful one.

mythic.name: Deadly Cloud (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: Jormungandr recharges and uses its Venomous Cloud, ignoring damage resistances.

trait.name: Acidic Blood
entries: A creature that touches the lindworm or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it takes 2 ({@damage 1d4}) acid damage.

trait.name: Venomous Fumes
entries: The lindworm exudes venomous fumes in a 5-foot radius around it. Each creature that starts its turn in this area must succeed on a {@dc 13} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition poisoned} until the start of its next turn.

monster.name: Adult Lindworm
languages: understands Common and Draconic but can't speak

trait.name: Acidic Blood
entries: A creature that touches the lindworm or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it takes 7 ({@damage 2d6}) acid damage.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (1/Day)
entries: If the lindworm fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Mystic Scales (Recharges after a Long Rest)
entries: The lindworm possesses mystic scales that grant it 100 temporary hit points and resistance to all damage except psychic damage. A section of the scales is broken either by depleting the lindworm's temporary hit points or by hitting it with a critical hit, causing the loss of any remaining temporary hit points. After the scales are broken, each time a creature within 30 feet of the lindworm makes an attack roll against it, the attacker must declare whether they are targeting the lindworm or its weak point. Attacking a weak point grants the lindworm a +3 bonus to AC against that attack, but the attack ignores the lindworm's resistances granted by this trait. Once a scale is broken, attacks that affect an area automatically ignore the lindworm's resistances. The lyndworm's scales reform after a long rest.

trait.name: Venomous Fumes
entries: The lindworm exudes venomous fumes in a 15-foot radius around it. Each creature that starts its turn in this area must succeed on a {@dc 17} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition poisoned} until the start of its next turn.

variant.name: Magic Resistance and Limited Magic Immunity
entries: In Norse legends and myths, Lindworms are frequently depicted as creatures enveloped in a mystical aura that grants them a robust defense against magical attacks. Game Masters might choose to emphasize this mythic characteristic, enhancing the lindworm's defense mechanisms in their epic battles. In a similar case, consider adding the following trait to lindworms:

items: {@b Magic Resistance:} The lindworm has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.
Elder or ancient lindworms could even possess an additional layer of defense against magical attacks to signify their ancient power and exceptional resilience against the arcane.
{@b Limited Magic Immunity:} Unless it wishes to be affected, the lindworm is immune to spells of 4th level or lower. It has advantage on saving throws against all other spells and magical effects.

entries: If Nidhogg fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Limited Magic Immunity
entries: Unless it wishes to be affected, Nidhogg is immune to spells of 4th level or lower. It has advantage on saving throws against all other spells and magical effects.

trait.name: Mystic Scales (Recharges after a Long Rest)
entries: Nidhogg possesses mystic scales that grant it 225 temporary hit points and resistance to all damage except psychic damage. A section of the scales is broken either by depleting Nidhogg's temporary hit points or by hitting it with a critical hit, causing the loss of any remaining temporary hit points. After the scales are broken, each time a creature within 30 feet of Nidhogg makes an attack roll against it, the attacker must declare whether they are targeting Nidhogg or its weak point. Attacking a weak point grants Nidhogg a +3 bonus to AC against that attack, but the attack ignores Nidhogg's resistances granted by this trait.
Once a scale is broken, attacks that affect an area automatically ignore Nidhogg's resistances. Nidhogg's scales reform after a long rest.

trait.name: Roots of Yggdrasil (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: If Nidhogg would be reduced to 0 hit points, its current hit points instead resets to 273 hit points, it recharges its Toxic Breath and its Mystic Scales trait, and it regains any expended uses of Legendary Resistance. Additionally, Nidhogg can now use the options in the

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Nidhogg can use its Frightful Presence. It then makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 18} to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. {@h}26 ({@damage 3d10 + 10}) piercing damage plus 14 ({@damage 4d6}) acid damage and 14 ({@damage 4d6}) poison damage.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 18} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}20 ({@damage 3d6 + 10}) slashing damage. If the target is a Huge or smaller creature, it is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 22}) and {@condition restrained} until this grapple ends. Nidhogg can have only one creature {@condition grappled} this way at a time.

action.name: Tail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 18} to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. {@h}23 ({@damage 3d8 + 10}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Frightful Presence
entries: Each creature of Nidhogg's choice that is within 300 feet of Nidhogg and aware of it must succeed on a {@dc 24} Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition frightened} for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to Nidhogg's Frightful Presence for the next 24 hours.

action.name: Toxic Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: Nidhogg exhales poisonous gas in a 120-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 26} Constitution saving throw, taking 52 ({@dice 8d12}) acid and 52 ({@damage 8d12}) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

legendary.name: Detect
entries: Nidhogg makes a Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) check.

legendary.name: Tail Attack
entries: Nidhogg makes one tail attack.

legendary.name: Wing Attack (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: Nidhogg beats its wings.

Each creature within 15 feet of it must succeed on a {@dc 26} Dexterity saving throw or take 23 ({@damage 3d8 + 10}) bludgeoning damage and be knocked {@condition prone}. Nidhogg can then fly up to half its flying speed.

legendary.name: Toxic Breath (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: Nidhogg immediately uses its Toxic Breath.

mythicHeader: If Nidhogg's Roots of Yggdrasil trait has activated in the last hour, it can use the options below as legendary actions.

mythic.name: Bite Attack
entries: Nidhogg makes one bite attack.

mythic.name: Corrupting Roots (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: Roots erupt from the ground in a 30-foot radius centered on a point Nidhogg can see within 120 feet of it. Each creature in that area other than Nidhogg must succeed on a {@dc 26} Dexterity saving throw or take 28 ({@damage 8d6}) necrotic damage and be {@condition restrained} by the roots for 1 minute. A creature can use its action to make a {@dc 22} Strength check, freeing itself on a success.

mythic.name: Toxic Burst (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: Nidhogg releases a burst of toxic energy. Each creature within 60 feet of Nidhogg must make a {@dc 26} Constitution saving throw, taking 33 ({@damage 6d10}) acid damage and 33 ({@damage 6d10}) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

monster.name: Ratatoskr
languages: understands all languages but communicates only through telepathy 120 ft.

trait.name: Agile Escape
entries: Ratatoskr doesn't provoke opportunity attacks when it moves out of an enemy's reach.

trait.name: Ancient Knowledge
entries: Ratatoskr has accumulated immense knowledge, and knows any information about lore, history, or the arcane.

trait.name: Rejuvenation
entries: If Ratatoskr dies, its spirit returns to the vicinity of the Yggdrasil Tree and it is resurrected with all its hit points after {@dice 1d4} hours. Ratatoskr can be permanently killed only if the Yggdrasil Tree is destroyed.

action.name: Tiny Spear
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d4 + 7}) piercing damage.

action.name: Instigate
entries: Ratatoskr causes animosity between two creatures within 60 feet. Each creature must succeed on a {@dc 15} Wisdom saving throw or use its action every turn to attack the other creature for 1 minute. A creature affected by animosity can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

reaction.name: Evasive
entries: Ratatoskr adds +7 to its AC against one attack that would hit it. To do so, Ratatoskr must see the attacker. If the attack misses, Ratatoskr can immediately move up to its speed as part of the same reaction.

entries: The skald has advantage on Intelligence ({@skill History}) and Intelligence ({@skill Arcana}) checks.

A {@condition paralyzed} creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d8 + 6}) necrotic damage.

action.name: Javelin
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d6 + 6}) necrotic damage.

action.name: Shadow Burst {@recharge 5}
entries: The svartálfar nightbringer releases a burst of shadow energy. Each creature of the nightbringer's choice within 30 feet of it must make a {@dc 18} Constitution saving throw, taking 42 ({@damage 12d6}) necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. The affected area becomes a zone of magical darkness as per the {@spell darkness} spell for the next minute.

bonus.name: Shadowstep
entries: The svartálfar teleports up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space it can see that is in dim light or darkness, gaining advantage on the next weapon attack it makes until the end of the current turn and dealing an extra 9 ({@damage 2d8}) necrotic damage on a hit.

reaction.name: Shadow Veil
entries: When the svartálfar is the target of an attack, it cloaks itself in shadows, imposing disadvantage on the attack roll.

legendary.name: Move
entries: The svartálfar nightbringer moves up to half its speed.

legendary.name: Shadow Strike (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The svartálfar nightbringer makes one longsword attack, dealing an additional 13 ({@damage 3d8}) necrotic damage on a hit.

legendary.name: Cast Spell (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: The svartálfar nightbringer casts a spell with its Innate Spellcasting trait.

legendary.name: Harbinger of Night (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: The nightbringer uses its Shadow Burst.

trait.name: Regeneration
entries: The troll whelp regains 1 hit point at the start of its turn. If the troll whelp takes acid or fire damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of the whelp's next turn.
The troll whelp dies only if it starts its turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

entries: The river troll calls upon the water in its vicinity to surge and lash out at its foes. Each creature within 15 feet of the troll must make a {@dc 15} Strength saving throw, taking 18 ({@damage 4d8}) bludgeoning damage and being knocked {@condition prone} on a failed save, or half as much damage and not being knocked {@condition prone} on a successful one. The river troll can only use this ability while inside a body of water or within 30 feet of it.

reaction.name: Water Shield
entries: The river troll magically forms a protective shield of water around it, adding 3 to its AC against one attack that would hit it. To do so, the river troll must see the attacker. The river troll can only use this ability while inside a body of water or within 30 feet of it.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The forest troll's innate spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 14}). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

trait.name: Forest Camouflage
entries: The forest troll has advantage on Dexterity ({@skill Stealth}) checks made to hide in forest terrain.

trait.name: Keen Smell
entries: The forest troll has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on smell.

trait.name: Regeneration
entries: The forest troll regains 10 hit points at the start of its turn if it isn't in sunlight. If the troll takes acid or fire damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of the troll's next turn. The troll dies only if it starts its turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

trait.name: Speak with Beasts and Plants
entries: The forest troll can speak with beasts and plants as if they shared a language.

trait.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
entries: While in sunlight, the forest troll has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on sight.

trait.name: Tree Stride
entries: Once on its turn, the forest troll can use 10 feet of movement to step magically into one tree within its reach and emerge from a second tree within 60 feet of the first tree, appearing in an unoccupied space within 5 feet of the second tree. Both trees must be Large or bigger.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The forest troll makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws. Alternatively, it can cast a spell and make an attack with its claws.
