trait.name: Earth Walk
entries: The stone troll ignores difficult terrain in rocky surfaces.

trait.name: Regeneration
entries: The stone troll regains 20 hit points at the start of its turn. If the troll takes acid or fire damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of the troll's next turn. The troll dies only if it starts its turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

trait.name: Siege Monster
entries: The stone troll deals double damage to objects and structures.

trait.name: Stone Camouflage
entries: The stone troll has advantage on Dexterity ({@skill Stealth}) checks made to hide in rocky terrain.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The stone troll makes three attacks: one with its stomp and two with its fists.

action.name: Fist
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}20 ({@damage 3d8 + 7}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Stomp
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}23 ({@damage 3d10 + 7}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Rock
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 11} to hit, range 60/240 ft., one target. {@h}29 ({@dice 4d10 + 7}) bludgeoning. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 19} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

bonus.name: Stoneskin {@recharge 5}
entries: The stone troll hardens its skin until the start of its next turn. Any creature that hits the troll with a melee weapon attack while its skin is hardened takes 7 ({@damage 2d6}) bludgeoning damage.

reaction.name: Boulder Stance
entries: When hit by a ranged attack, the stone troll attempts to absorb the projectile. The troll makes a Constitution saving throw with a DC equal to the damage dealt by the attack. On a successful save, the troll absorbs the projectile and takes no damage from it.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The trollkonor is a 11th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 16}, {@hit 8} to hit with spell attacks). It has the following spells prepared:

trait.name: Keen Smell
entries: The trollkonor has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on smell.

trait.name: Regeneration
entries: The trollkonor regains 20 hit points at the start of its turn if it isn't in sunlight. If the trollkonor takes acid or fire damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of the trollkonor's next turn. The trollkonor dies only if it starts its turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

trait.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
entries: While in sunlight, the trollkonor has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on sight.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The trollkonor can make two attacks with its claws or cast a spell and make one attack with its claws.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d6 + 5}) slashing damage plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) necrotic damage. The target's hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the necrotic damage taken, and the trollkonor regains hit points equal to half that amount. The reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest. The target dies if this effect reduces its hit point maximum to 0.

bonus.name: Dark Curse {@recharge 5}
entries: The trollkonor attempts to curse a creature it can see within 60 feet of it. The target must succeed on a {@dc 16} Wisdom saving throw or be cursed for 1 minute. While cursed, the target has disadvantage on attack rolls, saving throws, and ability checks. Any attack the trollkonor makes against a cursed target deals an additional 4 ({@damage 1d8}) necrotic damage. The curse ends early if the trollkonor is {@condition incapacitated} or dies. The trollkonor can have only one target cursed at a time.

resist.note: from nonmagical attacks that aren't adamantine

trait.name: Mountain Born
entries: The mountain troll has advantage on saving throws against being knocked {@condition prone} or pushed against its will. Additionally, the troll ignores difficult terrain in stony or rocky surfaces.

trait.name: Keen Smell
entries: The mountain troll has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on smell.

trait.name: Regeneration
entries: The mountain troll regains 20 hit points at the start of its turn if it has at least 1 hit point.

trait.name: Siege Monster
entries: The mountain troll deals double damage to objects and structures.

trait.name: Stone Camouflage
entries: The mountain troll has advantage on Dexterity ({@skill Stealth}) checks made to hide in rocky terrain.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The mountain troll makes three attacks: one with its stomp and two with its fists.

action.name: Fist
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 13} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}26 ({@damage 4d8 + 8}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Stomp
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 13} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}30 ({@damage 4d10 + 8}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Rock
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 13} to hit, range 60/240 ft., one target. {@h}34 ({@damage 4d12 + 8}) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 21} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Rockslide {@recharge 5}
entries: The mountain troll causes a small avalanche or rockslide if within stony or rocky terrain.

Creatures other than the troll within a 30-foot radius centered on the troll must make a {@dc 21} Dexterity saving throw, taking 42 ({@damage 12d6}) bludgeoning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

bonus.name: Seismic Stomp {@recharge 5}
entries: The mountain troll stomps the ground. All creatures within 15 feet must make a {@dc 21} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

trait.name: Keen Hearing and Sight
entries: The ulfhednar scout has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on hearing or sight.

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The ulfhednar scout has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the scout's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

trait.name: Wolf's Prowl
entries: The ulfhednar scout has advantage on Dexterity ({@skill Stealth}) and Wisdom ({@skill Survival}) checks.

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The ulfhednar warrior has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the warrior's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

trait.name: Reckless
entries: At the start of its turn, the ulfhednar warrior can gain advantage on all melee weapon attack rolls it makes during that turn, but attack rolls against it have advantage until the start of its next turn.

trait.name: Wolf's Prowl
entries: The ulfhednar warrior has advantage on Dexterity ({@skill Stealth}) and Wisdom ({@skill Survival}) checks.

action.name: Greatsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) slashing damage.

trait.name: Animal Companion
entries: The ulfhednar beastmaster is accompanied by a {@creature feral wolf|MythologicalCreatures}, which obeys the beastmaster's commands and acts on its own initiative.

trait.name: Bonded Fury
entries: When the {@creature feral wolf|MythologicalCreatures} accompanying the ulfhednar beastmaster takes damage, the beastmaster goes into a primal fury until the end of its next turn, dealing an additional 3 ({@damage 1d6}) slashing damage each time it hits with a weapon attack.

trait.name: Feral Instinct
entries: The ulfhednar beastmaster has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Animal Handling}) checks.

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The ulfhednar beastmaster has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the beastmaster's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

trait.name: Wolf's Prowl
entries: The ulfhednar beastmaster has advantage on Dexterity ({@skill Stealth}) and Wisdom ({@skill Survival}) checks.

action.name: Battleaxe
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) slashing damage, or 8 ({@damage 1d10 + 3}) slashing damage if wielded with two hands.

bonus.name: Wolf Command
entries: The ulfhednar beastmaster commands its {@creature feral wolf|MythologicalCreatures} to perform one of the following actions, provided the wolf expends a reaction to perform it.

bonus.name: Coordinated Attack
entries: The wolf makes a bite attack against a target the beastmaster has attacked this turn.

bonus.name: Guard
entries: The wolf takes a defensive stance, granting it a +2 bonus to AC until the start of the beastmaster's next turn.

bonus.name: Intimidating Snarl
entries: The wolf lets out a fearsome snarl, causing one creature of the beastmaster's choice within 15 feet to succeed on a {@dc 13} Wisdom saving throw or have disadvantage on the next attack roll it makes.

bonus.name: Pack Hunter
entries: The wolf aids the beastmaster, granting it a +2 bonus on its next attack and damage roll against a creature that is within 5 feet of the wolf.

bonus.name: Stalking Shadow
entries: The wolf moves stealthily, granting it advantage on the next Dexterity ({@skill Stealth}) check it makes until the start of the beastmaster's next turn.

bonus.name: Tactical Retreat
entries: The wolf moves up to its speed without provoking opportunity attacks.

trait.name: Bonded Fury
entries: When the ulfhednar beastmaster accompanied by the feral wolf takes damage, the wolf goes into a primal fury until the end of its next turn, dealing an additional 3 ({@damage 1d6}) piercing damage each time it hits with a weapon attack.

trait.name: Keen Hearing and Smell
entries: The feral wolf has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The feral wolf has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the wolf's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 12} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The ulfhednar shaman is a 5th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 13}, {@hit 5} to hit with spell attacks). The shaman has the following spells prepared:

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The ulfhednar shaman has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the shaman's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

trait.name: Reckless
entries: At the start of its turn, the ulfhednar shaman can gain advantage on all melee weapon attack rolls it makes during that turn, but attack rolls against it have advantage until the start of its next turn.

trait.name: Wolf's Prowl
entries: The ulfhednar shaman has advantage on Dexterity ({@skill Stealth}) and Wisdom ({@skill Survival}) checks.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The ulfhednar shaman makes two quarterstaff attacks. Alternatively, it makes one quarterstaff attack and casts one spell with a casting time of one action.

action.name: Quarterstaff
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} to hit ({@hit 5} to hit with shillelagh), reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d6 + 1}) bludgeoning damage, or 7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) bludgeoning damage with shillelagh.

trait.name: Brute
entries: A melee weapon deals one extra die of its damage when the ulfhednar berserker hits with it (included in the attack).

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The ulfhednar berserker has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the berserker's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

trait.name: Reckless
entries: At the start of its turn, the ulfhednar berserker can gain advantage on all melee weapon attack rolls it makes during that turn, but attack rolls against it have advantage until the start of its next turn.

trait.name: Wolf's Prowl
entries: The ulfhednar berserker has advantage on Dexterity ({@skill Stealth}) and Wisdom ({@skill Survival}) checks.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The ulfhednar berserker makes two attacks with its greataxe.

action.name: Greataxe
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}17 ({@damage 2d12 + 4}) slashing damage.

bonus.name: War Howl (1/Day)
entries: The ulfhednar berserker lets out a mighty howl. Each creature of the ulfhednar berserker's choice that is within 30 feet of it and can hear it must succeed on a {@dc 15} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition frightened} for 1 minute. A {@condition frightened} creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The ulfhednar war-priest is a 10th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 15}, {@hit 7} to hit with spell attacks). The war-priest has the following spells prepared:

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The ulfhednar war-priest has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the warpriest's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

trait.name: Reckless
entries: At the start of its turn, the ulfhednar war-priest can gain advantage on all melee weapon attack rolls it makes during that turn, but attack rolls against it have advantage until the start of its next turn.

trait.name: Wolf's Prowl
entries: The ulfhednar war-priest has advantage on Dexterity ({@skill Stealth}) and Wisdom ({@skill Survival}) checks.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The ulfhednar war-priest makes two attacks with its warhammer. Alternatively, it makes one attack with its warhammer and casts a spell with a casting time of one action.

action.name: Warhammer
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) bludgeoning damage, or 9 ({@damage 1d10 + 4}) bludgeoning damage if wielded with two hands.

trait.name: Brute
entries: A melee weapon deals one extra die of its damage when the ulfhednar vargrherjar hits with it (included in the attack).

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The ulfhednar vargrherjar has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the vargrherjar's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

trait.name: Reckless
entries: At the start of its turn, the ulfhednar vargrherjar can gain advantage on all melee weapon attack rolls it makes during that turn, but attack rolls against it have advantage until the start of its next turn.

trait.name: Wolf's Prowl
entries: The ulfhednar vargrherjar has advantage on Dexterity ({@skill Stealth}) and Wisdom ({@skill Survival}) checks.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The ulfhednar vargrherjar makes three attacks with its greataxe.

action.name: +1 Greataxe
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}19 ({@damage 2d12 + 6}) slashing damage.

bonus.name: War Howl (2/Day)
entries: The ulfhednar vargrherjar lets out a mighty howl. Each creature of the vargrherjar's choice that is within 30 feet of it and can hear it must succeed on a {@dc 16} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition frightened} for 1 minute. A creature {@condition frightened} in this way also has its speed reduced by 10 feet for the duration. A {@condition frightened} target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The valkyrie is a 13th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 19}, {@hit 11} to hit with spell attacks). The valkyrie has the following spells prepared:

trait.name: Divine Awareness
entries: The valkyrie knows if she hears a lie.

trait.name: Divine Resilience
entries: While below her half hit points maximum, the valkyrie has advantage on all saving throws and resistance to all damage types.

trait.name: Divine Weapons
entries: The valkyrie's weapon attacks are magical and deal an extra 10 ({@damage 3d6}) radiant damage (already included in the attacks).

trait.name: Inspiring Presence
entries: Friendly creatures within 30 feet of the valkyrie have advantage on saving throws against being {@condition charmed} or {@condition frightened}.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If the valkyrie fails a saving throw, she can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The valkyrie has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The valkyrie makes three weapon attacks.

action.name: Longsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 12} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}17 ({@damage 2d10 + 6}) slashing damage plus 10 ({@damage 3d6}) radiant damage.

action.name: Longbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 11} to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d8 + 5}) piercing damage plus 10 ({@damage 3d6}) radiant damage.

action.name: Healing Touch (3/Day)
entries: The valkyrie touches another creature. The target magically regains 40 ({@dice 8d8 + 4}) hit points and is freed from any curse, disease, poison, blindness, or deafness.

bonus.name: Divine Smite
entries: When the valkyrie hits a creature with a melee weapon attack, she can expend one spell slot to deal radiant damage to the target, in addition to the weapon's damage. The extra damage is {@dice 1d8} for a 1st-level spell slot, plus {@dice 1d8} for each spell level higher than 1st.

bonus.name: Voice of Command
entries: The valkyrie issues a command to an ally that she can see within 60 feet. The ally can immediately use its reaction to make one weapon attack.

legendary.name: Attack
entries: The valkyrie makes one weapon attack.

legendary.name: Move (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The valkyrie moves up to her speed without provoking opportunity attacks. If the valkyrie is mounted, her mount moves instead.

legendary.name: Healing Touch (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The valkyrie uses her Healing Touch.

legendary.name: Cast Spell (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: The valkyrie casts a spell using her Spellcasting trait.

monster.name: Valkyrie Queen

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The valkyrie queen is a 17th-level spellcaster.
Its spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 22}, {@hit 14} to hit with spell attacks). The valkyrie has the following spells prepared:

trait.name: Divine Awareness
entries: The valkyrie queen knows if she hears a lie.

trait.name: Divine Resilience
entries: When reduced to half her hit points or less, the valkyrie queen gains advantage on all saving throws and resistance to all damage.

trait.name: Divine Weapons

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (5/Day)

trait.name: Magic Resistance

The extra damage is {@dice 2d8} for a 1st-level spell slot, plus {@dice 1d8} for each spell level higher than 1st, up to a maximum of {@dice 5d8}.

bonus.name: Voice of Command
entries: The valkyrie queen issues a command to an ally that she can see within 60 feet. The ally can immediately use its reaction to make one weapon attack.

trait.name: Fearless
entries: The alux's intense rage and battle focus grant it advantage on saving throws against being {@condition frightened}.

trait.name: Forest's Fury
entries: When below half its hit point maximum, the alux deals an extra 2 ({@damage 1d4}) damage with melee attacks.

trait.name: Forest's Whisper
entries: The alux can communicate with plants and animals as if under the effect of a speak with plants or {@spell speak with animals} spell.

entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d10 + 4}) slashing damage.

action.name: War Shout (1/Day)
entries: The alux lets out a fierce shout, instilling fear and disarray among its enemies. All enemy creatures within 30 feet must succeed on a {@dc 13} Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition frightened} for 1 minute. A {@condition frightened} creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. This shout also emboldens allies within 30 feet of the alux, granting them advantage on attack rolls and saving throws until the start of the alux's next turn.

bonus.name: Frenzied Attack (2/Day)
entries: The alux enters a frenzy for 1 minute, making one additional attack with its macuahuitl as part of its Multiattack. While frenzied, the alux has advantage on Strength ability checks and saving throws, but it can't cast spells or concentrate on them.

monster.name: Anchanchu
languages: understands all languages but can't speak

trait.name: Shapechanger
entries: The anchanchu can use its action to polymorph into a Small or Medium humanoid, or back into its true form. Its statistics are the same in each form.

trait.name: Terrifying Presence
entries: Creatures within 30 feet that can see the anchanchu must succeed on a {@dc 17} Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition frightened} for 1 minute. A {@condition frightened} creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the anchanchu's Terrifying Presence for the next 24 hours.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The anchanchu makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) piercing damage plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) psychic damage.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) slashing damage.

reaction.name: Psychic Feedback
entries: When a creature the anchanchu can see hits it with an attack, the anchanchu forces the attacker to make a {@dc 17} Intelligence saving throw. On a failure, the attacker takes 7 ({@damage 2d6}) psychic damage and is {@condition stunned} until the start of the anchanchu's next turn.

trait.name: Forest Camouflage

trait.name: Alpha Presence
entries: The bigfoot alpha exudes an aura of dominance and authority that other bigfoot creatures naturally follow. Every other bigfoot creature within 60 feet of the bigfoot alpha gain advantage on attack rolls and saving throws.

trait.name: Forest Camouflage

action.name: Multiattack

action.name: Slam

This bonus action can be used only if the bigfoot hasn't moved during this turn, and after using this bonus action, its speed is reduced to 0 until the end of the current turn.

reaction.name: Evasive
entries: When targeted by an attack, the bigfoot alpha moves up to its speed without provoking opportunity attacks.

Each creature within 60 feet of the bigfoot that can hear it must succeed on a {@dc 16} Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition frightened} for 1 minute. A {@condition frightened} creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

monster.name: Grey Cadejo
languages: understands Common and Sylvan but can't speak

trait.name: Keen Hearing and Smell
entries: The cadejo has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

trait.name: Telepathic Bond
entries: The cadejo can communicate telepathically with any creature it has {@condition charmed}, and it can perceive through the {@condition charmed} creature's senses as long as they are on the same plane of existence.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The cadejo makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its claws.

entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) piercing damage plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) psychic damage.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 2d4 + 3}) slashing damage plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) psychic damage.

action.name: Mystic Gaze
entries: The cadejo locks eyes with a creature it can see within 30 feet. The target must succeed on a {@dc 13} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition charmed} for 1 minute. A creature {@condition charmed} in this way is {@condition incapacitated} and has a speed of 0. The effect ends if the cadejo or one of the cadejo's companions harms the target. The cadejo can have only one target {@condition charmed} at a time. If the target's saving throw is successful, the target is immune to the cadejo's Mystic Gaze for the next 24 hours.

reaction.name: Telepathic Shield
entries: When a creature the cadejo can see targets it with an attack, the cadejo imposes disadvantage on the attack roll.

entries: The cadejo makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its claws.

trait.name: Corrupted Guardian
entries: The canotila has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.
Additionally, the canotilla can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain. It takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

trait.name: Sickly Aura
entries: The canotila's aura extends into its attacks. A creature hit by its slam has disadvantage on the next saving throw it makes within 1 minute.

trait.name: Twisted Growth
entries: The canotila's presence disrupts natural healing. When a creature within 30 feet of the canotila regains hit points, it regains only half the normal amount.

entries: The canotila makes two slam attacks.

action.name: Slam

Each other creature in that area must make a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw, taking 21 ({@damage 6d6}) necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. Plants in the area are automatically affected and take maximum damage.

entries: When a creature within 10 feet of the canotila is reduced to 0 hit points, the canotila absorbs the creature's life force, regaining 23 ({@dice 5d8}) hit points.

monster.name: Cipactli

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: Cipactli's spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 20}, {@hit 12} to hit with spell attacks). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: Cipactli can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Chaotic Surge (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: If Cipactli would be reduced to 0 hit points, its current hit points instead resets to 280 and it regains one expended use of Legendary Resistance. Additionally, Cipactli can now use the options in the

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If Cipactli fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Lord of the Deep
entries: While in water, Cipactli regains 10 hit points at the start of its turn if it has at least 1 hit point.

trait.name: Primal Awareness
entries: Cipactli can sense the presence of creatures within 1 mile of it in water, and within 100 feet of it on land.

trait.name: Siege Monster
entries: Cipactli deals double damage to objects and structures.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Cipactli makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its tail.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 17} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}26 ({@damage 3d10 + 10}) piercing damage, and the target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 21}). Cipactli can have a maximum of one creature {@condition grappled} in this way at any time.

action.name: Tail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 17} to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. {@h}23 ({@damage 3d8 + 10}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Swallow
entries: Cipactli makes one bite attack against a Large or smaller target that is {@condition grappled}. On a hit, the target is swallowed, and the grapple ends. A swallowed creature is {@condition blinded} and {@condition restrained}, it has total cover against attacks and other effects outside Cipactli, and it takes 35 ({@damage 10d6}) acid damage at the start of each of Cipactli's turns. If Cipactli takes 40 damage or more on a single turn from a creature inside it, Cipactli must succeed on a Constitution saving throw with a DC equal to half the damage taken (rounded up) at the end of that turn or regurgitate all swallowed creatures, which fall {@condition prone} in a space within 10 feet of Cipactli. If Cipactli dies, a swallowed creature is no longer {@condition restrained} by it and can escape from the corpse by using 30 feet of movement, exiting {@condition prone}.

reaction.name: Chaotic Rebuke
entries: After being hit by an attack, Cipactli releases a burst of chaotic energy, dealing 10 ({@damage 3d6}) force damage to the the attacker if it is within 10 feet of Cipactli.

legendary.name: Tail Attack
entries: Cipactli makes one tail attack.

legendary.name: Engulf (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: Cipactli makes one bite attack against a target. If the attack hits, the target is also swallowed.

legendary.name: Spell (Costs 3 Actions)

mythicHeader: If Cipactli's Chaotic Surge trait has activated in the last hour, it can use the options below as legendary actions.

mythic.name: Grevious Bite
entries: Cipactli makes one bite attack. If the attack hits, it deals an additional 10 ({@damage 3d6}) necrotic damage, and Cipactli regains hit points equal to half the necrotic damage dealt.

mythic.name: Summon Waters (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: Cipactli calls forth turbulent waters in a 120-foot radius centered on itself. The area becomes difficult terrain, and each creature in the area must succeed on a {@dc 25} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}. Cipactli is immune to this effect.

mythic.name: Chaotic Vortex (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: Cipactli creates a swirling vortex of chaotic energy in a 30-foot radius centered on itself. Each creature in that area other than Cipactli must make a {@dc 25} Constitution saving throw, taking 56 ({@damage 16d6}) force damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. Objects in the area also take the damage.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting

action.name: Cigar Smoke

reaction.name: Mischievous Escape
entries: When Cipitio is hit by an attack, he turns {@condition invisible} and moves up to his speed without provoking opportunity attacks.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The cosmic shaman is a 9th-level spellcaster.
Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 16}, {@hit 8} to hit with spell attacks). The shaman has the following spells prepared:

trait.name: Ancestral Guidance
entries: The shaman can communicate with ancestral spirits, granting it advantage on Wisdom checks.

trait.name: Cosmic Knowledge
entries: The shaman has insight into celestial events and can predict auspicious moments, gaining advantage on Initiative rolls.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The shaman makes one attack with its staff or two cosmic ray attacks.

action.name: Spirit Staff
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) bludgeoning damage plus 4 ({@damage 1d8}) psychic damage.

action.name: Cosmic Ray
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 8} to hit, range 60 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 1d10 + 5}) radiant or necrotic damage.

action.name: Ancestral Spirits {@recharge 5}
entries: The shaman calls forth ancestral spirits in a 20-foot-radius sphere within 60 feet.

Each creature of the shaman's choice in that area must make a {@dc 16} Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, a target takes 14 ({@damage 4d6}) radiant or necrotic damage and is {@condition frightened} for 1 minute. On a successful save, the target takes half damage and isn't {@condition frightened}. A {@condition frightened} creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

bonus.name: Cosmic Insight
entries: The shaman uses its connection to the cosmos to gain insight into the future, granting it advantage on its next attack roll, saving throw, or ability check until the end of its next turn.

reaction.name: Spiritual Deflection
entries: When the shaman is hit by an attack, it reduces the damage by 9 ({@dice 1d8 + 5}).

This reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest. The target dies if this effect reduces its hit point maximum to 0.

entries: The skinwalker can use its bonus action to polymorph into an animal or a medium humanoid it has seen, or back into its true form. Its statistics are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The skinwalker makes two melee attacks.

action.name: Mind Control {@recharge 5}
entries: The skinwalker targets one creature it can see within 30 feet of it. The target must succeed on a {@dc 14} Wisdom saving throw or be magically {@condition charmed} for 1 minute. The {@condition charmed} target obeys the skinwalker's verbal commands. If the target suffers any harm or receives a harmful command, it can repeat the saving throw, ending the effect on itself on a success.

bonus.name: Mystic Veil {@recharge 3}
entries: The skinwalker becomes {@condition invisible} until the start of its next turn or until it attacks.

bonus.name: Swift Retreat
entries: The skinwalker moves up to its speed without provoking opportunity attacks.

reaction.name: Distracting Sound
entries: When a creature the skinwalker can see makes an attack, the skinwalker creates a disorienting sound, imposing disadvantage on the attack roll.

monster.name: Stone Coat Giant

trait.name: Immutable Form
entries: The stone coat giant is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (1/Day)
entries: If the stone coat giant fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Mountain's Fortitude
entries: The stone coat giant has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition stunned}.

trait.name: Siege Monster
entries: The stone coat giant deals double damage to objects and structures.

trait.name: Stone's Awakening (Recharges after Short or Long Rest)
entries: When the stone coat giant is reduced to or below 132 hit points, it regains all expended uses of Legendary Resistance, its AC increases by 2, and its rocky exterior begins to radiate an intense, freezing aura. Creatures that start their turn within a 15-foot radius centered on the stone coat giant for the duration take 10 ({@damage 3d6}) cold damage.
Additionally, the stone coat giant can now use the options detailed in the

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The stone coat giant makes two slam attacks.

action.name: Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 16} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}28 ({@damage 4d8 + 10}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Boulder Throw
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 16} to hit, range 80/240 ft., one target. {@h}43 ({@damage 6d10 + 10}) bludgeoning damage. The boulder remains in the targeted area, providing half cover. The boulder has AC 15, 50 hit points, and immunity to poison and psychic damage.

action.name: Icy Boulder Throw
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 16} to hit, range 80/240 ft., one target. {@h}43 ({@damage 6d10 + 10}) bludgeoning damage. Creatures within a 10-foot radius of the point of impact must make a {@dc 21} Dexterity saving throw, taking an additional 18 ({@damage 4d8}) cold damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. The cold from the boulder creates a slick, icy surface in the affected area that lasts for 1 minute. The icy area is difficult terrain for every creature other than the stone coat giant, and creatures that enter the area or start their turn there must succeed on a {@dc 15} Dexterity saving throw or fall {@condition prone}. The boulder remains in the targeted area, providing half cover. The icy boulder has AC 15, 50 hit points, and immunity to poison and psychic damage. The stone coat giant can only use this attack while within icy, or frosty terrain.

action.name: Frosty Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: The stone coat giant exhales a blast of freezing wind in a 60-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 21} Constitution saving throw, taking 55 ({@damage 10d10}) cold damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. The stone coat giant can only use this ability while within icy, or frosty terrain.

reaction.name: Rocky Endurance
entries: When the stone coat giant takes damage, it reduces the damage by half.

legendary.name: Move
entries: The stone coat giant moves up to its speed without provoking opportunity attacks.

legendary.name: Slam Attack (Cost 2 Actions)
entries: The stone coat giant makes one slam attack.

legendary.name: Frost Breath (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: The stone coat giant uses its Frost Breath.

mythicHeader: Once its Stone's Awakening trait is activated, the stone coat giant can use the options below as legendary actions.

mythic.name: Frozen Ground
entries: The ground in a 40-foot radius around the stone coat giant becomes icy until the end of its next turn.
The affected area is difficult terrain for every creature other than the stone coat giant.

mythic.name: Chilling Slam (Cost 2 Actions)
entries: The stone coat giant makes one slam attack. If the attack hits, the target takes an additional 14 ({@damage 4d6}) cold damage and has its speed reduced by 10 feet until the end of its next turn.

mythic.name: Rockslide (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: The stone coat giant causes a cascade of boulders to roll down in a 60-foot long, 20-foot wide line in a direction it chooses. Each creature in that line must make a {@dc 21} Strength saving throw, taking 42 ({@damage 12d6}) bludgeoning damage and being knocked {@condition prone} on a failed save, or half as much damage and not being knocked {@condition prone} on a successful one.

monster.name: Supay

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: Supay's spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 24}, {@hit 16} to hit with spell attacks). He can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

trait.name: Charming Aura
entries: Supay exudes a charming aura in a 120-foot radius. A creature that starts its turn in this aura must succeed on a {@dc 24} Wisdom saving throw or have disadvantage on attack rolls against Supay for 1 minute. An affected creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

trait.name: Divine Awareness
entries: Supay knows if he hears a lie.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If Supay fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Lord of the Ukhu Pacha (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: If Supay would be reduced to 0 hit points, his current hit points instead resets to 225 and he regains 2 expended uses of Legendary Resistance. Additionally, Supay can now use the options in the

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: Supay has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Supay can use his Frightful Presence. He then makes three attacks: one with his tail and two with his claws.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 15} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}21 ({@damage 3d8 + 8}) slashing damage plus 14 ({@damage 4d6}) necrotic damage.

action.name: Tail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 15} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}24 ({@damage 3d10 + 8}) bludgeoning damage plus 14 ({@damage 4d6}) necrotic damage.

action.name: Frightful Presence
entries: Each creature of Supay's choice within 120 feet of him and aware of him must succeed on a {@dc 24} Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition frightened} for 1 minute. A {@condition frightened} creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.
If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to Supay's Frightful Presence for the next 24 hours.

action.name: Summon Devils {@recharge 5}
entries: Supay magically summons devils based on the result of a {@dice d100} roll. {@dice d100} Summoned Devils
These devils act on their own initiative and obey Supay's commands.

legendary.name: Devilish Strike
entries: Supay makes one melee weapon attack.

legendary.name: Teleport (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: Supay teleports up to 120 feet to an unoccupied space he can see.

legendary.name: Infernal Gaze (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: Supay fixes his gaze on a creature he can see within 60 feet of him. The target must succeed on a {@dc 24} Wisdom saving throw or take 45 ({@damage 10d8}) psychic damage and be {@condition stunned} until the end of its next turn.

mythicHeader: If Supay's Lord of the Ukhu Pacha trait has activated in the last hour, he can use the options below as legendary actions.

mythic.name: Supay's Embrace
entries: Supay chooses a creature within 60 feet. The target must make a {@dc 24} Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes 35 ({@damage 10d6}) necrotic damage and is {@condition restrained} by ethereal chains for 1 minute. A {@condition restrained} creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on a success.

mythic.name: Soul Drain (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: Supay targets a creature within 60 feet. The target must succeed on a {@dc 24} Constitution saving throw or take 55 ({@damage 10d10}) necrotic damage, and Supay regains hit points equal to half the damage dealt. On a successful save, the creature takes half damage, and Supay doesn't regain hit points.

mythic.name: Hellfire Beam (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: Supay unleashes a beam of hellish fire in a 120-foot line that is 30 feet wide. Each creature in that line must make a {@dc 24} Dexterity saving throw, taking 27 ({@dice 5d10}) fire damage and 27 ({@damage 5d10}) necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting

trait.name: Astral Presence
entries: Tzitzimitl can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain. It takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

trait.name: Celestial Affinity
entries: Tzitzimitl has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects dealing radiant damage, originating from celestial beings, or related to the stars and the night sky.

trait.name: Celestial Alignment (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: If Tzitzimitl would be reduced to 0 hit points, its current hit points instead resets to 215, it recharges its Astral Scream, and it regains any expended uses of Legendary Resistance.
The sky darkens ominously, and Tzitzimitl emanates a menacing glow. Tzitzimitl can now use the options in the

trait.name: Eclipse's Call
entries: During a solar or lunar eclipse, Tzitzimitl's abilities recharge faster. All rechargeable abilities recharge at the start of each of its turns during an eclipse.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If Tzitzimitl fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Nightborn
entries: Tzitzimitl gains a +1 bonus to AC and saving throws when fighting under a night sky.

The reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest. The target dies if this effect reduces its hit point maximum to 0.

action.name: Astral Scream {@recharge 5}
entries: Tzitzimitl releases a terrifying scream. Each creature within 60 feet other than Tzitzimitl must make a {@dc 21} Wisdom saving throw, taking 45 ({@damage 10d8}) psychic damage and being {@condition frightened} for 1 minute on a failed save, or half as much damage and not being {@condition frightened} on a successful one. A {@condition frightened} creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

Unless surprised, a creature can avert its eyes to avoid the saving throw at the start of its turn. If the creature does so, it can't see the Uktena until the start of its next turn, when it can avert its eyes again. If the creature looks at the Uktena in the meantime, it must immediately make the save.

entries: The Wampus cat magically shifts from the Material Plane to the Ethereal Plane, or vice versa.

legendary.name: Claw Attack
entries: The Wampus cat makes one claw attack.

legendary.name: Terrifying Gaze (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The Wampus cat fixes its gaze on one creature it can see within 30 feet of it. The target must succeed on a {@dc 17} Wisdom saving throw or take 39 ({@damage 6d12}) psychic damage and be {@condition frightened} until the end of the creature's next turn.

monster.name: Wendigo
languages: understands the languages it knew in life but can't speak

trait.name: Keen Smell
entries: The wendigo has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on smell.

trait.name: Insatiable Hunger
entries: The wendigo has advantage on melee attack rolls against any creature that doesn't have all its hit points.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The wendigo makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its claws.

monster.name: Xolotl

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: Xolotl's spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 25}, {@hit 17} to hit with spell attacks). He can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

trait.name: Eternal Vigilance
entries: Xolotl cannot be surprised.

trait.name: Guidance of Souls
entries: Whenever an ally within 60 feet of Xolotl makes a saving throw, it can roll a {@dice d4} and add the number rolled to the save.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (5/Day)
entries: If Xolotl fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Lightning of Destruction
entries: Any lightning damage dealt by Xolotl ignores lightning resistance and treats lightning immunity as lightning resistance.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: Xolotl has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Master of Flames
entries: Any fire damage dealt by Xolotl ignores fire resistance and treats fire immunity as fire resistance.

trait.name: Twilight's Emissary (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: If Xolotl would be reduced to 0 hit points, his current hit points instead resets to 305 and it recharges its Souls Steal.
Additionally, Xolotl can now use the options in the

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Xolotl makes three attacks with his whips.

action.name: Flame Whip
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 17} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}31 ({@dice 4d10 + 9}) fire damage.

action.name: Lightning Whip
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 17} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}31 ({@damage 4d10 + 9}) lightning damage.

action.name: Soul Steal {@recharge 4}
entries: Xolotl reaches into a creature's chest within 20 feet of itself and grabs its soul. The target must make a {@dc 25} Constitution saving throw, taking 130 ({@damage 20d12}) necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

reaction.name: Twilight Shield
entries: Xolotl adds 5 to its AC against one attack that would hit it. If the attack misses, the attacker takes 5 ({@dice 1d10}) fire damage and 5 ({@damage 1d10}) lightning damage if it is within 15 feet of Xolotl.

legendary.name: Move
entries: Xolotl moves up to half his speed without provoking opportunity attacks.

legendary.name: Whip Attack (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: Xolotl makes one whip attack.

legendary.name: Cast a Spell (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: Xolotl casts a spell with his Innate Spellcasting trait.

legendary.name: Soul Steal (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: Xolotl uses his Soul Steal.

mythicHeader: If Xolotl's Twilight's Emissary trait has activated in the last hour, he can use the options below as legendary actions.

mythic.name: Ethereal Chain
entries: Xolotl sends forth a chain that can pass through obstacles to grasp at a creature's soul within 60 feet. The target must succeed on a {@dc 25} Constitution saving throw or take 35 ({@damage 10d6}) necrotic damage and be {@condition restrained} for 1 minute. A {@condition restrained} target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

mythic.name: Twilight Veil (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: Xolotl casts a veil of twilight in a 30-foot radius centered on himself. The area is heavily obscured until the end of his next turn.

mythic.name: Soul Rend (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: Xolotl uses his Soul Steal. If the target fails the saving throw, it also suffers a level of {@condition exhaustion}.

trait.name: Aquatic Camouflage
entries: Yacumama has advantage on Dexterity ({@skill Stealth}) checks made while submerged in water.

trait.name: Hold Breath
entries: Yacumama can hold its breath for 1 hour.

trait.name: Slippery Scales
entries: While partially submerged in water, Yacumama's slippery body makes it difficult to land attacks.
Attackers have disadvantage on their first attack roll against it each turn.

trait.name: Water Agility
entries: Yacumama has advantage on Dexterity saving throws while partially submerged in water.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Yacumama makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its tail.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 14} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}31 ({@damage 4d10 + 9}) piercing damage.

action.name: Tail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 14} to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. {@h}27 ({@damage 4d8 + 9}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Water Jet {@recharge 5}
entries: Yacumama exhales a blast of water in a 60-foot line that is 5 feet wide. Each creature in that line must make a {@dc 22} Strength saving throw, taking 45 ({@damage 10d8}) bludgeoning damage and being knocked {@condition prone} and pushed up to 20 feet away from Yacumama on a failed save, or taking half as much damage and not being pushed or knocked {@condition prone} on a successful one.

trait.name: Ancient Presence
entries: Creatures within 60 feet of Sachamama have disadvantage on saving throws against being {@condition frightened}.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (2/Day)
entries: If Sachamama fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Rooted to the Earth
entries: Sachamama can't be knocked {@condition prone}, and it has advantage on saving throws and ability checks against being pushed against its will.

trait.name: Siege Monster
entries: Sachamama deals double damage to objects and structures.

trait.name: Tight Coils
entries: Once per turn, Sachamama has advantage on its constrict attack.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Sachamama makes two attacks with its bite or two with its constrict.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 16} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}36 ({@damage 4d12 + 10}) piercing damage.

action.name: Constrict
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 16} to hit, reach 10 ft., one creature. {@h}28 ({@damage 4d8 + 10}) bludgeoning damage, and the target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 20}). Until this grapple ends, the target is {@condition restrained}, and Sachamama can't constrict another target.

reaction.name: Defensive Curl
entries: When targeted by an attack, Sachamama increases its AC by +7 against that attack.

reaction.name: Snap Back
entries: When missed by a melee attack, Sachamama makes one bite attack against the attacker.

legendary.name: Move
entries: Sachamama moves up to half its speed withut provoking opportunity attacks.

legendary.name: Attack (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: Sachamama makes one attack.

legendary.name: Invoke Terror (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: Each creature of Sachamama's choice within 120 feet of it and aware of it must succeed on a {@dc 22} Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition frightened} for 1 minute. A {@condition frightened} creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

trait.name: Shapechanger
entries: The yacuruna can use its action to polymorph into a creature of Medium size it has seen before, or back into its true form. Its statistics are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

reaction.name: Command the Depths

monster.name: Anubis

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: Anubis' spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 26}, {@hit 18} to hit with spell attacks). He can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

trait.name: Aura of Judgement
entries: Each creature of Anubis' choice that starts its turn within 30 feet of him must make a {@dc 26} Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the creature is {@condition frightened} until the start of its next turn.

trait.name: Divine Awareness
entries: Anubis knows if he hears a lie.

trait.name: Duat Overlord (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: When Anubis is reduced to 0 hit points, his current hit points instead reset to 265, he recharges his Divine Command and Soul Gaze abilites, he regains 2 expended uses of Legendary Resistance, and he enters a state of divine ascendancy for 1 hour. In this state, his movement speed doubles, his weapon attacks deal an extra 18 ({@damage 4d8}) force damage, and he can use the options in the

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If Anubis fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Judgment of the Dead
entries: Anubis can perform a 10-minute ritual that judges the soul of a deceased creature he touches. If the creature's soul is deemed worthy, it is transported to the afterlife. If not, the soul is destroyed.

trait.name: Regeneration
entries: Anubis regains 20 hit points at the start of his turn if he has at least 1 hit point.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Anubis uses either his Divine Command or Soul Gaze ability and then makes two attacks with his staff.

action.name: Ankh Staff
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 17} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}27 ({@damage 4d8 + 9}) bludgeoning damage plus 11 ({@damage 2d10}) radiant damage and 11 ({@damage 2d10}) necrotic damage.

action.name: Divine Command {@recharge 4}
entries: Anubis issues a command that is magically compelling. A creature of Anubis's choice that he can see within 120 feet of him and that can hear him must succeed on a {@dc 26} Wisdom saving throw or follow his command on its next turn as per the {@spell command} spell.

action.name: Soul Gaze {@recharge 4}
entries: Anubis targets one creature he can see within 60 feet of him. The target must make a {@dc 26} Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the creature is {@condition paralyzed} for 1 minute. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

reaction.name: Judge's Retribution
entries: When hit by a melee attack, Anubis unleashes a burst of divine energy. The attacker must make a {@dc 26} Constitution saving throw, taking 11 ({@damage 2d10}) radiant damage and 11 ({@damage 2d10}) necrotic damage and being pushed up to 20 feet away from Anubis on a failed save, or taking half damage and not being pushed on a successful one.

legendary.name: Ankh Staff Attack
entries: Anubis makes one staff attack.

legendary.name: Teleport (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: Anubis magically teleports, along with any equipment he is wearing or carrying, up to 120 feet to an unoccupied space he can see.

legendary.name: Soul Reaping (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: Anubis targets one creature he can see within 60 feet of him. The target must make a {@dc 26} Constitution saving throw, taking 55 ({@damage 10d10}) necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. If this damage reduces a creature to 0 hit points, Anubis destroys its soul, which can only be restored to life by a wish or {@spell true resurrection} spell.

mythicHeader: If Anubis' Duat Overlord trait has activated in the last hour, he can use the options below as legendary actions.

mythic.name: Ethereal Strike
entries: Anubis makes one attack with his Ankh Staff.
This attack is made with advantage, overriding any other effects that would give disadvantage. Additionally, the {@spell shield} spell provides no bonus against this attack.

mythic.name: Judgment (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: Anubis targets one creature he can see within 120 feet of him. The target must succeed on a {@dc 26} Wisdom saving throw or take 55 ({@damage 10d10}) psychic damage and be {@condition stunned} until the end of its next turn.

mythic.name: Wrath of the Underworld (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: Anubis channels the power of the underworld in a 60-foot radius around himself. Each creature in this area must make a {@dc 26} Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 27 ({@damage 5d10}) radiant damage and 27 ({@damage 5d10}) necrotic damage, and is {@condition blinded} and {@condition deafened} for 1 minute. On a successful save, the creature takes half the damage and is not {@condition blinded} or {@condition deafened}. A creature affected by the blindness and deafness can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effects on itself on a success.

trait.name: Anubis Blessing
entries: The Anubis jackal has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Additionally, the jackal regenerates 5 hit points at the start of its turn if it has at least 1 hit point. If the Anubis jackal takes radiant damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of the jackal's next turn.

trait.name: Keen Hearing and Smell
entries: The Anubis jackal has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The Anubis jackal has advantage on attack rolls against a creature if at least one of the jackal's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The Anubis jackal makes one attack with its bite and one with its claws.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) piercing damage plus 4 ({@damage 1d8}) necrotic damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 13} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

A {@condition frightened} creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, with disadvantage if the jackal is within line of sight, ending the effect on itself on a success.

trait.name: Guardian of the Dead

trait.name: Guardian of the Dead

trait.name: Guardian of the Dead
entries: The anubite embalmer has advantage on attack rolls against undead creatures. Its weapon attacks are magical and deal additional necrotic damage on a hit.

action.name: Multiattack

action.name: Embalming Tools
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) slashing damage plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) necrotic damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition poisoned} for 1 minute. A creature {@condition poisoned} in this way is also {@condition paralyzed} for the duration. A {@condition poisoned} creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on a success.

action.name: Mummify {@recharge 4}
entries: The anubite embalmer targets one {@condition paralyzed} creature within 5 feet of it. The target must succeed on a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw or take 21 ({@damage 6d6}) necrotic damage.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The anubite oracle is a 10th-level spellcaster.
Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 16}, {@hit 8} to hit with spell attacks). The anubite oracle has the following spells prepared:

trait.name: Anubis Blessing
entries: The anubite oracle regains 5 hit points at the start of its turn if it has at least 1 hit point. Additionally, it has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Guardian of the Dead
entries: The anubite oracle has advantage on attack rolls against undead creatures. Its weapon attacks are magical and deal additional radiant damage on a hit.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The anubite oracle makes two attacks with its staff. It can replace one attack with its Prophecy of Doom or to cast a spell with its Spellcasting trait.

action.name: Staff of the Ages
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d8 + 5}) bludgeoning damage plus 10 ({@damage 3d6}) radiant damage.

action.name: Prophecy of Doom {@recharge 5}
entries: The anubite oracle targets one creature it can see within 60 feet of it. The target must succeed on a {@dc 16} Wisdom saving throw or receive a dire prophecy, suffering disadvantage on attack rolls, ability checks, and saving throws for 1 minute. The target can make another Wisdom saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

reaction.name: Shift Fate
entries: After an attack roll, ability check, or saving throw is made within 60 feet of the anubite oracle, the oracle forces a reroll.

trait.name: Anubis Blessing
entries: The anubite warlord regains 10 hit points at the start of its turn if it has at least 1 hit point. Additionally, it has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Guardian of the Dead
entries: The anubite warlord has advantage on attack rolls against undead creatures. Its weapon attacks are magical and deal additional necrotic damage on a hit.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The anubite warlord makes three attacks with its war spear.

action.name: War Spear
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}12 ({@damage 1d12 + 6}) piercing damage plus 9 ({@damage 2d8}) necrotic damage.

action.name: Sands of the Desert {@recharge 5}
entries: The anubite warlord magically summons a sandstorm in a 20-foot-radius sphere centered on a point it can see within 60 feet. The area becomes heavily obscured, and each creature in it at the start of its turn must make a {@dc 18} Constitution saving throw, taking 21 ({@damage 6d6}) slashing damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. The storm lasts for 1 minute or until the anubite warlord loses {@status concentration} (as if {@status concentration||concentrating} on a spell).

bonus.name: Command Ally
entries: The anubite warlord issues a command to one ally it can see within 30 feet of it. The target can use its reaction to make one weapon attack.

legendary.name: Move
entries: The anubite warlord moves up to half its speed without provoking opportunity attacks.

legendary.name: War Spear Attack (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The anubite warlord makes one attack with its war spear.

legendary.name: Sandstorm (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: The anubite warlord uses its Sands of the Desert.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The anubite high priest is a 12th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 19}, {@hit 11} to hit with spell attacks). The high priest has the following spells prepared:

trait.name: Anubis Blessing
entries: The anubite high priest regains 10 hit points at the start of its turn if it has at least 1 hit point.
Additionally, it has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Guardian of the Dead
entries: The high priest has advantage on attack rolls against undead creatures. Its weapon attacks are magical and deal additional radiant damage on a hit.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The anubite high priest makes two attacks with its scepter. Alternatively, the priest makes one attack with its scepter and casts a spell with its Spellcasting trait.

action.name: Scepter of the Afterlife
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 1d10 + 5}) bludgeoning damage plus 13 ({@damage 3d8}) radiant damage.

legendary.name: Move
entries: The anubite high priest moves up to half its speed.

legendary.name: Scepter Attack (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The anubite high priest makes one attack with its scepter.

legendary.name: Spellcasting (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: The anubite high priest casts a spell with its Spellcasting trait.

trait.name: Camel Handling
entries: The Egyptian nomad can command a camel with ease. The camel understands and obeys the nomad's commands.

trait.name: Desert Survivalist
entries: The Egyptian nomad has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Survival}) checks made in desert environments.

action.name: Scimitar
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d6 + 1}) slashing damage.

action.name: Shortbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 3} to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d6 + 1}) piercing damage.

entries: The Egyptian nomad captain can command a camel with ease. The camel understands and obeys the captain's commands.

reaction.name: Pharaoh's Shield
entries: When the Medjay guard is within 5 feet of the Pharaoh and the Pharaoh takes damage from an attack targeting only it, the guard intercepts the attack, taking the damage instead of the Pharaoh.

entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 4} to hit, range 100/400 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d10 + 2}) piercing damage.

bonus.name: Tactical Leader
entries: The Medjay captain grants advantage on the next attack roll to one ally it can see within 30 feet of it.

reaction.name: Pharaoh's Guard
entries: When the Medjay captain is within 5 feet of the Pharaoh and the Pharaoh takes damage from an attack targeting only it, the captain intercepts the attack, taking the damage instead of the Pharaoh.

reaction.name: Countermand
entries: When a creature within 5 feet of the Medjay captain targets a creature, the captain imposes disadvantage on that attack roll.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) bludgeoning damage.

trait.name: Carrying Capacity
entries: 2 Medium creatures & 400lb cargo

trait.name: Half Speed on Damaged Camel
entries: If a War Camel pulling the War Chariot dies, its speed is reduced by half. If both War Camels die, the War Chariot can't move.
Action Stations

trait.name: Mishaps
entries: If the War Chariot takes more than 20 damage from a single source if suffers a mishap. Roll on the {@table War Chariot Mishaps|MythologicalCreatures} table to determine what goes wrong.

action.name: Rapid Fire Arrows (Requires Archer Position)
entries: {@atk rw} +4 to hit, range 150/600 ft. The archer makes two attacks in quick succession. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) piercing damage per arrow.

action.name: Helm (Requires 1 Crew)
entries: Drive and steer the War Chariot.

action.name: Archer Position (Requires 1 Crew)
entries: Use ranged weapons to attack from the chariot.

reaction.name: Quick Maneuver
entries: If the War Chariot is able to move, the driver can use its reaction to grant the War Chariot advantage on a Dexterity saving throw.

trait.name: Amphibious Adaptation
entries: The Petsuchos ignores difficult terrain in natural aquatic environments.

trait.name: Aquatic Ambush
entries: The Petsuchos has advantage on Dexterity ({@skill Stealth}) checks made to hide while submerged in water.

trait.name: Hold Breath
entries: The Petsuchos can hold its breath for up to 30 minutes.

trait.name: Keen Smell
entries: The Petsuchos has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on smell.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (1/Day)
entries: If the Petsuchos fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The Petsuchos has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The Petsuchos makes three attacks: one with its bite, one with its claws and one with its tail.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}19 ({@damage 2d12 + 6}) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 15} Dexterity saving throw or be {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 15}). Until this grapple ends, the target is {@condition restrained}, and the Petsuchos can't bite another target.

action.name: Claws

action.name: Tail Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d8 + 6}) bludgeoning damage, and the target must succeed on a {@dc 15} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

reaction.name: Predator Reflexes
entries: When a creature hits the Petsuchos with an attack, the petsuchos makes a tail swipe attack against the attacker.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The Pharaoh is a 9th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 16}, {@hit 9} to hit with spell attacks). The Pharaoh has the following spells prepared:

trait.name: Aura of Command
entries: Allies within 10 feet of the Pharaoh gain a +1 bonus to attack rolls and saving throws (already included in the Pharaoh's statblock).

trait.name: Divine Right
entries: The Pharaoh has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition charmed} or {@condition frightened}.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The Pharaoh makes two scepter attacks.

action.name: Scepter of the Pharaoh
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) bludgeoning damage plus 3 ({@damage 1d6}) radiant or necrotic damage.

action.name: Commanding Presence {@recharge 5}
entries: The Pharaoh targets up to two creatures it can see within 30 feet of it. Each target must succeed on a {@dc 16} Wisdom saving throw or follow the command given by the Pharaoh on its next turn as per the {@spell command} spell.

action.name: Divine Retribution (1/Day)
entries: The Pharaoh unleashes divine energy in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 16} Dexterity saving throw, taking 27 ({@damage 6d8}) radiant or necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

bonus.name: Blessing of the Gods
entries: The Pharaoh blesses one ally it can see within 30 feet of it, granting it 7 ({@dice 2d6}) temporary hit points and advantage on its next attack roll or saving throw.

reaction.name: Royal Decree
entries: When a creature within 30 feet of the Pharaoh attacks, the Pharaoh imposes disadvantage on that roll.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The High Pharaoh is a 13th-level spellcaster.
Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 18}, {@hit 12} to hit with spell attacks). The High Pharaoh has the following spells prepared:

trait.name: Aura of Majesty
entries: Allies within 15 feet of the High Pharaoh gain a +2 bonus to attack rolls and saving throws (already included in the Pharaoh's statblock).

trait.name: Divine Right
entries: The High Pharaoh has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition charmed} or {@condition frightened}.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (1/Day)
entries: If the High Pharaoh fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The High Pharaoh makes two scepter attacks.
The Pharaoh can replace one attack to cast a spell or use its Commanding Presence.

action.name: Scepter of the High Pharaoh
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d10 + 3}) bludgeoning damage plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) radiant or necrotic damage.

action.name: Commanding Presence {@recharge 5}
entries: The High Pharaoh targets up to three creatures it can see within 30 feet of it.
Each target must succeed on a {@dc 18} Wisdom saving throw or follow the command given by the Pharaoh on its next turn as per the {@spell command} spell.

action.name: Divine Retribution (2/Day)
entries: The High Pharaoh unleashes divine energy in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 18} Dexterity saving throw, taking 35 ({@damage 10d6}) radiant or necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

bonus.name: Blessing of the Gods
entries: The High Pharaoh blesses one ally it can see within 30 feet of it, granting it 10 ({@dice 3d6}) temporary hit points and advantage on its next attack roll or saving throw.

reaction.name: High Royal Decree
entries: When a creature within 30 feet of the High Pharaoh attacks, the Pharaoh imposes disadvantage on that roll and uses its sacred flame spell against it.

monster.name: Supreme Pharaoh

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The Supreme Pharaoh is a 17th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 20}, {@hit 15} to hit with spell attacks). The Pharaoh has the following spells prepared:

trait.name: Aura of Dominion
entries: Allies within 20 feet of the Supreme Pharaoh gain a +3 bonus to attack rolls and saving throws (already included in the Pharaoh's statblock).

trait.name: Divine Ascension (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: When the Supreme Pharaoh is reduced to 0 hit points, its current hit points instead reset to 125, and it enters a state of Divine Ascension for 1 hour. In this state, the Supreme Pharaoh gains advantage on all attack rolls and saving throws. It also gains access to its Mythological Actions.
Award a party an additional an additional 13,000 XP (26,000 XP total) for defeating the Pharaoh after Divine Ascension activates grants.

trait.name: Divine Right
entries: The Supreme Pharaoh has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition charmed} or {@condition frightened}.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (2/Day)
entries: If the Supreme Pharaoh fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The Supreme Pharaoh makes three scepter attacks. The Pharaoh can replace one attack to cast a spell or use its Commanding Presence.

action.name: Scepter of the Supreme Pharaoh
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 12} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d10 + 4}) bludgeoning damage plus 10 ({@damage 3d6}) radiant or necrotic damage.

action.name: Commanding Presence {@recharge 5}
entries: The Supreme Pharaoh targets up to three creatures it can see within 60 feet of it. Each target must succeed on a {@dc 20} Wisdom saving throw or follow the command given by the Pharaoh on its next turn as per the {@spell command} spell.

action.name: Divine Retribution (3/Day)
entries: The Supreme Pharaoh unleashes divine energy in a 60-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 20} Dexterity saving throw, taking 45 ({@damage 10d8}) radiant or necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

bonus.name: Blessing of the Gods
entries: The High Pharaoh blesses one ally it can see within 30 feet of it, granting it 14 ({@dice 4d6}) temporary hit points and advantage on its next attack roll or saving throw.

reaction.name: Pharaoh's Decree
entries: When a creature within 30 feet of the Supreme Pharaoh attacks, the Pharaoh imposes disadvantage on that roll and uses its sacred flame or {@spell command} spell against it.

legendary.name: Scepter Strike
entries: The Supreme Pharaoh makes one scepter attack.

legendary.name: Cast a Spell. (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The Supreme Pharaoh casts a spell up to 5th-level.

legendary.name: Divine Command (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: The Supreme Pharaoh uses its Commanding Presence.

mythicHeader: If the Supreme Pharaoh's Divine Ascension trait has activated in the last hour, it can use the options below as legendary actions.

mythic.name: Ancestral Judgment (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The Supreme Pharaoh calls upon the power of its predecessors to smite foes. It targets one creature it can see within 60 feet. The target must make a {@dc 20} Dexterity saving throw, taking 45 ({@damage 10d8}) radiant or necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

mythic.name: Wrath of the Nile (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The Supreme Pharaoh unleashes the fury of the Nile in a 30-foot radius centered on a point it can see within 90 feet. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 20} Constitution saving throw, taking 35 ({@damage 10d6}) bludgeoning damage be knocked {@condition prone} on a failed save, or half as much damage and not be knocked {@condition prone} on a successful one.

mythic.name: Sands of Time (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: The Supreme Pharaoh manipulates the flow of time within a 30-foot radius centered on itself. Each creature in this area other than the Pharaoh must make a {@dc 20} Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the creature is slowed (as per the {@spell slow} spell) for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

trait.name: Fire Form
entries: The phoenix can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing. Any creature that touches the phoenix or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it takes 5 ({@dice 1d10}) fire damage. In addition, the phoenix can enter a hostile creature's space and stop there. The first time it enters a creature's space on a turn, that creature takes 5 ({@dice 1d10}) fire damage.

trait.name: Flyby
entries: The phoenix doesn't provoke opportunity attacks when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

trait.name: Radiating Presence
entries: The phoenix sheds bright light in a 30- foot radius and dim light for an additional 30 feet. Each creature that starts its turn in the bright light must succeed on a {@dc 13} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition blinded} until the start of its next turn.

trait.name: Rejuvenation
entries: Upon death, the phoenix turns to ash. After {@dice 1d4} days, it is reborn from the ashes with all its hit points.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The phoenix makes two attacks: one with its beak and one with its talons.

action.name: Beak
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d4 + 5}) piercing damage plus 7 ({@dice 2d6}) fire damage.

action.name: Fiery Talons
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d6 + 5}) slashing damage plus 7 ({@dice 2d6}) fire damage.
